hypo: The translation of the sentence is:  Their logic and hidden words are as difficult as tennis balls, you know you can't learn it, and you don't want to buy expensive ones, so I'll sell you some cheap ones to mess with you. If you play with them twice, you won't want to play anymore, and it's cheap, so you won't feel sorry.

src: 等你真的能分辨好坏，说明你进步了，到时候再来我这里买贵的，我赚两次钱。
tgt: If you can tell the difference, it means you have made improvement; then you can come here to buy the expensive ones and I will make money twice.
hypo: "If you can really distinguish good from bad, it means you've made progress. Come back here and buy something expensive later, and I'll make twice as much money."

src: 建议花相似的价钱，买个二手好一点的球拍，选择prince、或者邓禄普的，这两个品牌足够没名气，所以好球拍也卖不上价钱，新拍500、600就很好了，二手的200块，拥有千元拍的享受不香吗？
tgt: I recommend you to spend the same amount of money on a better-quality second hand racket such as prince or DUNLOP; these two brands are not famous, and so even if they are good, they are not expensive; you can get a new one with 500 or 600 yuan and a second hand one with 200 yuan; isn’t it nice to have a thousand yuan racket with only so little money?
hypo: Here's the English translation of the sentence:  "It's recommended to spend similar money on a second-hand good camera, either Prince or Yongnuo, as these two brands are not well-known, so a good camera can be bought at a reasonable price. A new camera with a price of 500 or 600 yuan is good enough, while a second-hand one costs only 200 pieces, why not enjoy the 1,000 yuan camera at a low cost?"

src: 对新手挺友好，但一过了新手阶段就鸡肋了，但大部分人，特别是女生，过不了新手阶段。
tgt: It’s friendly to newbies, but once you passed that stage, it will become not so useful; but most people, especially girls, cannot pass the newbie stage.
hypo: "Especially girls, most people, including newcomers, are friendly at first, but once they get past the newcomer stage, they're all chicken."

src: 第十八届“世界饮料创新奖”（World Beverage Innovation Awards）是FoodBev Media与德国纽伦堡国际啤酒、酿酒及饮料工业展览会（Brau Beviale）联合举办的奖项。
tgt: The 18th “World Beverage Innovation Awards” is an award jointly held by FoodBev Media and Brau Beviale.
hypo: "The 18th "World Beverage Innovation Awards" is a jointly organized award by FoodBev Media and the International Beer, Wine and Liquor Trade Fair (Brau Beviale) held in Nuremberg, Germany."

src: 吸引了来自25个国家、22个不同品类的279个作品参赛。
tgt: It attracted 279 works from 25 countries and 22 categories to participate in the competition.
hypo: "The competition attracted 279 works from 25 countries and 22 different categories."

src: 10月15日，决赛入围者名单公布，最终获奖者名单将于11月11日（英国夏令时）线上公布。
tgt: On October 15th, the list of the finalists was published, and the final list of winners will be published online on November 11 (BST).
hypo: "The finalists for the competition will be announced on October 15th, and the list of winners will be published online on November 11th (British Summer Time)."

src: 我们看到，元气森林的LP28无糖酸奶入围最佳乳饮料奖，伊利安慕希的“GOGO武汉”营销入围最佳营销活动，百事可乐和人民日报新媒体合作的包装还入围最佳包装设计/标签奖。
tgt: We have seen that Genki Forest’s LP28 sugar-free yoghurt was shortlisted for the Award of Best Milk Drink; the marketing of “GOGO Wuhan” of Yili AMBROSIAL was shortlisted for the Award of Best Marketing Activity; the packaging jointly designed by Pepsi and the new media of People’s Daily was shortlisted for the Award of Best Packaging Design/Label.
hypo: We saw that the LP28 without sugar acid milk of Yuan Qing Forest won the Best Dairy Drink award, the "GOGO Wuhan" marketing campaign of Illinois won the Best Marketing Event award, and the packaging collaboration between Bai Shi Jia Jia and People's Daily New Media won the Best Packaging/Label Design award.

src: FoodBev Media高级市场营销总监Laura Nettle表示：我们很高兴与Brau Beviale一起庆祝年度世界饮料创新奖的第18年。
tgt: Laura Nettle, senior marketing director of Foodbev Media, said, “we are pleased to celebrate the 18th year of the annual world beverage innovation award with Brau beviale”.
hypo: Laura Nettle, the annual, Foodbev Media

src: 从新口味、新概念和新功能到品牌、包装和制造，随着行业不断以更可持续的方式进行创新，我们看到了饮料行业的趋势。
tgt: From new tastes, new concepts, new functions to brands, packaging and manufacturing, as the industry continues to innovate in a more sustainable way, we have seen the trends of the beverage industry.
hypo: "As new flavors, concepts, and functions emerge in the beverage industry, we are seeing a trend towards more sustainable innovation."

src: 世界饮料创新奖表彰了全球饮料行业新老品牌今年最具雄心的新产品和新发展。
tgt: The world beverage innovation award recognizes the most ambitious new products and developments of new and old brands in the global beverage industry this year.
hypo: The World Drink Innovation Award honored the most innovative new products and new developments in the global beverage industry this year.

src: 以下是每个类别的决赛入围者的完整榜单。
tgt: Here is the complete list of all the finalists of each category.
hypo: Here is the complete list of contestants for each category:

src: Ardagh Group开发的技术，可以将100％的回收玻璃重新熔化成新的瓶子。
tgt: Technology developed by Ardagh Group can melt 100% of recycled glass into new bottles.
hypo: "Ardagh Group's technology can recycle 100% of the glass and melt it down into new bottles."

src: 箱中袋装水，其包装盒采用100％可回收利用，可减少包装66％，减少碳排放97％。
tgt: The packaging of the bagged water in the box is 100% recyclable, which can reduce packaging by 66% and carbon emission by 97%.
hypo: "Wrapping the water in boxes, the packaging box adopts 100% recyclable materials, reducing packaging by 66%, and reducing carbon emissions by 97%."

src: LatCub是100％可生物降解，使用更少的纸，并且不使用对环境有害的胶水或胶带。
tgt: Latcub is 100% biodegradable; it uses less paper, and does not use glue or tape that is harmful to the environment.
hypo: LatCub is 100% biodegradable, which uses less paper and does not contain harmful adhesives such as environmentally harmful glues or adhesive strips.

src: Ardagh Group开发的技术，可以将100％的回收玻璃重新熔化制成新的瓶子。
tgt: Technology developed by Ardagh Group can melt 100% of recycled glass and make them into new bottles.
hypo: "Ardagh Group's technology can recycle 100% of the glass and melt it down into new bottles."

src: 最终获奖名单将于11月11日（英国夏令时）在FoodBev Media的 YouTube频道公布，FBIF将持续为您报道，敬请期待！
tgt: The final list of the winners will be published on the YouTube channel of FoodBev Media on November 11 (BTS), and FBIF will continue to report for you, so stay tuned!
hypo: The final list of award winners will be announced on November 11th (British Summer Time) on the FoodBev Media YouTube channel, and FBIF will continue to report to you. Please look forward to it!

src: 2021年什么最火？
tgt: What is the hottest thing in 2021?
hypo: What was hot in 2021?

src: 无疑是东京奥运会。
tgt: It was none other than the Tokyo Olympics.
hypo: "It is undoubtedly the Tokyo Olympics."

src: 您以为只有奥运健儿才能拿奖吗？
tgt: Do you think only Olympic athletes can win awards?
hypo: Do you think that only Olympic athletes can win awards?

src: 前段时间有篇《快看！项目经理可冲击金牌的奥运项目》文章很火，里面提到项目经理们在很多项目上，绝对是可以一马当先，无人能匹： 搬砖、出差、熬夜是项目经理的日常，救火、背锅、道歉更是不在话下。
tgt: Recently, there is an article titled Look! An article titled Olympic Disciplines in Which Project Managers Can Win Gold Medals was viral, and it mentioned that project managers can be the foremost and unmatched in many disciplines, such as working arduously, going on business trips, and staying up late, the everyday work of project manager, and handling emergency, taking the blame and apologizing are nothing difficult at all.
hypo: The original sentence is: "在很多项目上，项目经理们绝对是可以一马当先，无人能匹：搬砖、出差、熬夜是项目经理的日常，救火、背锅、道歉更是不在话下。"  Here's the English translation: "In many projects, project managers are absolutely the first ones to arrive and the last ones to leave: moving furniture, business trips, and all-nighters are the project manager's daily routine, while fire-fighting, last

src: 看似玩笑调侃的一篇文章，却也道出了项目经理们的日常辛酸，背后代表的是对当前项目管理工作的力不从心。
tgt: A seemingly joking article also tells the bitterness of their daily work, and the hidden message is their insufficient energy to handle the current project management work.
hypo: "Seemingly joking but also expressing the daily bitterness of the project manager, behind which represents a lack of enthusiasm for the current project management work."

src: 而从事项目管理工作的人员，也渐渐选择通过一些行动来让自己摆脱工作中的困境。
tgt: People engaged in project management also gradually choose to get rid of the predicament in work by taking certain actions.
hypo: "As for the project management staff, they also gradually choose to take actions to extricate themselves from their work environment."

src: 从每年攀升的PMP（国际认证的项目管理专业人士资格）报名人数来看，越来越多的项目管理从业人员通过学习来提升自己的项目管理能力。
tgt: Judging from the increasing number of PMP (internationally certified project management professional qualification) applicants each year, increasing project management practitioners improve their project management ability through learning.
hypo: "According to the increasing number of PMP certification holders annually, more and more project management professionals are improving their project management skills through learning."

src: 据《中国项目管理二十年发展报告(1999-2019)》称：截止到2019年9月，全国累计PMP®报考人数近60万人次，通过PMP®认证人数约42万人，有效持证人数约30万人, 占全球PMP®持证总量的31.2%。
tgt: According to the 20-year Development Report on China’s Project Management (1999-2019), as of September 2019, the national PMP ® applicants totals 600,000, with 420,000 passed the PMP ® certification, and the number of valid certificate holders are about 300,000, accounting for 31.2% of the total number of certificates of PMP ® in the world.
hypo: According to the "Chinese Project Management Professional (PMP) Twenty-Year Development Report (1999-2019)": By September 2019, the total number of PMP® exam candidates in China had reached nearly 600,000, and the number of certified PMP® professionals was approximately 420,000, with an effective certification rate of around 300,000, accounting for 31.2% of the global total number of PMP® certifications.

src: 近10年PMP持证人数逐年递增，这说明越来越多的项目管理者意识到：靠简单照搬以往“老经验”来做事已不可取，瞬息万变的工作环境让我们知道一个要学会，站在科学巨人的肩膀上去探索前行的道路。
tgt: In the past ten years, the number of people holding PMP certificates keeps increasing, which indicates that more and more project managers realize it is no longer advisable to do things by simply copying “past experience”; the rapidly changing working environment tells us that we should learn to stand on the shoulders of scientific giants and explore the way forward.
hypo: In the past decade, the number of PMP certification holders has increased year by year, which indicates that more and more project managers are aware that relying solely on past experience to get things done is no longer effective. The rapidly changing work environment requires us to learn how to adapt and explore new ways of doing things. Standing on the shoulders of scientific giants, we can venture forth to explore new paths.

src: 然而，考了PMP就能保证项目管理工作畅通无阻了吗？
tgt: However, can you ensure the smooth proceeding of project management work after passing the PMP test?
hypo: "However, passing the PMP exam does not guarantee smooth project management work, does it?"

src: 很多项目管理初学者表示，通过学习PMP/IPMP等相关课程，可以系统性地掌握项目管理的十大领域和五大过程组等相关知识点，但真正进行项目管理工作的时候却还是一头雾水。
tgt: Many beginners of project management say that by learning courses of PMP/IPMP, they can systematically master knowledge points such as the ten fields and five major process groups of project management, but they are still confused when they are actually engaged in project management work.
hypo: Many beginner project managers indicate that by studying PMP/IPMP and related courses, they can systematically master the ten areas and five process groups of project management, but they still feel lost when actually conducting project management work.

src: 很多项目经理常常反馈以下问题： 项目管理认知不到位，单纯依靠个人经验，空有项目管理理论，不知如何实践； 缺乏系统的项目管理流程制度支撑，工作中无法落地，项目预估不准，把控度灵敏度差，项目一拖再拖； 成员分工不明确、团队中的“老油条”不知如何应对 跨部门协助沟通不顺畅，项目难以推进 ……
tgt: Many project managers often reflect the following problems: project management awareness is not sufficient, relying solely on personal experience, and there is only project management theories and no ideas about how to practice them; lack of support of systematic project management process and system, unable to actually implement the work, inaccurate project estimation, poor sensitivity of control, and project being delayed again and again; the members’ division of labor is not clear, there’s no way to handle the “sophisticated ones” in the team, communication is not smooth between departments, and it is difficult to push the project forward...
hypo: Many managers often complain about the following issues: lack of project management awareness, relying solely on personal experience, lack of project management theory and practice, not knowing how to apply it; lack of a systematic project management process and support system, unable to get a foothold in work, project estimates are not accurate, overly sensitive to control, the project is dragged on and on; unclear team member assignments, "old oil patches" in the team do not know how to deal with cross-departmental assistance in communication is not smooth, the project is difficult to advance ...

src: 因此，专注产品创新与研发管理领域十余载，已帮助众多优秀的企业培养了大批的产品经理、项目经理等研发关键人才，并获得了 “中国企业研发管理人才培训示范基地”等荣誉称号的中天华夏咨询带着《研发项目经理特训营》线上课程来了。
tgt: Therefore, ZTCHINA, which has been focusing on the field of product innovation and R&D of management for more than ten years and helped many excellent enterprises cultivate a large number of key R&D talents such as product managers and project managers, and won the honorary title of “China Enterprise R&D and Management Talents Training Demonstration Base”, presents the online course R&D Project Manager Special Training Camp.
hypo: "Therefore, we will continue to focus on the fields of product innovation and R&D management, and have already helped many excellent enterprises cultivate a large number of product managers and project managers through our training programs. We are proud to have earned the title of "Chinese Enterprise R&D Management Talent Training Demonstration Base" and will bring our online course "Project Manager Professional Training" to you."

src: 《研发项目经理特训营》线上课程 这是一种线上碎片化学习的方式，结合了众多研发型企业的实战案例、工具和方法，帮助您掌握项目经理必备知识及标准动作，走上自身项目管理的进阶之路。
tgt: The online course R&D Project Manager Special Training Camp is an online fragmented learning method, which combines the practical cases, tools and methods of many research and development type enterprises to help you master the necessary knowledge and standard actions of project managers, and embark on the advancing journey of project management on your own.
hypo: "Research and Development Project Manager Training" online course is a practical and fragmented learning method that combines the real-life case studies, tools, and methods of various enterprises, helping you master the essential knowledge and standard actions of a project manager and step up to the next level of project management."

src: 这也是一次让企业用更低的成本和更少的投入，促进项目经理的培养进程，为企业带来高效运作结果的机会。
tgt: This is also an opportunity for enterprises to promote the training process of project managers and bring efficient operation results to enterprises with less cost and investment.
hypo: "This is also an opportunity for enterprises to use lower costs and fewer investments to promote the training process for project managers, which can bring about efficient operations for the company."

src: 口说无凭，可以先看看其他学员怎么评价这门课程： 这门课程不仅是由中天华夏专家团队（原华为研发管理团队），结合国际先进的项目管理方法论和众多知名企业真实业务场景，对课程内容进行深入浅出的专业讲解。
tgt: That’s all my own introduction, and you may see how other students evaluate this course: This course is not only a professional explanation of the course content in simple terms by the ZTCHINA expert team (former Huawei R&D management team), combining international advanced project management methodology and real business scenarios of many well-known enterprises.
hypo: "口说无凭，可以先看看其他学员怎么评价这门课程：这门课程不仅是由中天华夏专家团队（原华为研发管理团队），结合国际先进的项目管理方法论和众多知名企业真实业务场景，对课程内容进行深入浅出的专业讲解。确保包含这些词：real business."

src: 更是会提供科学实用的管理工具与方法，丰富的模板表单，帮助学员在课后将学习的内容转化运用于具体工作。
tgt: It also provides scientific and practical management tools and methods as well as rich template forms to help students transform and apply the content into specific work after class.
hypo: Provide students with practical management tools and methods, rich template forms to help them apply what they have learned in class to their work.

src: 号称新山区超跑排气声最大！
tgt: It is said to have the biggest exhaust noises of all supercars in Xinshan District!
hypo: The translation of the sentence "号称新山区超跑排气声最大！" to English is:  "The slogan of the New Mountain District is to run out of breath! Ensure it includes these words: exhaust, district."

src: 这次我们团队为大家带来的这款车，是许多男人的梦想！
tgt: The car that our team brings you now is the dream of many men!
hypo: "This time, our team has brought you this car, which is the dream of many men!"

src: 它就是Lamborghini的旗舰超跑，Murcielago的换代车型 — Aventador LP700-4！
tgt: It is Lamborghini’s flagship supercar and Murcielago’s next generation model, Aventador LP700-4!
hypo: "This is Lamborghini's flagship supercar, the replacement model for Murcielago - the Aventador LP700-4!"

src: 要价马币近两百万，一年的路税马币十几千，四轮驱动，为什么叫LP700？
tgt: It is priced nearly 2 million MYR and pays a road tax of around a dozen thousand each year; it is a four-wheel drive; why is it called LP700?
hypo: "Why is it called LP700 when it costs nearly two hundred thousand yuan and the annual tax for a horse is ten thousand yuan, with four-wheel drive?"

src: 因为拥有700匹的马力，你能想象有多快吗？
tgt: Because it has 700 horsepower; can you image how fast that is?
hypo: "Because it has 700 horses, can you imagine how fast it can be?"

src: 那算了小编也不知道，数据说0-100km/h加速只需要2.9秒，大概就是小编的myvi才要到30km/h的时候人家就到100km/h了，嗯。
tgt: Forget it, I don’t know, either; data says it takes only 2.9s to accelerate from 0 to 100km/h; when my myvi just reaches 30km/h, it is already at 100km/h, hum.
hypo: According to the data, it only takes 2.9 seconds to accelerate from 0-100 km/h, so even if the little ones don't know, when their Myvi reaches 30 km/h, they'll already be at 100 km/h, won't they?

src: 低矮的车身、嚣张的剪刀门、遍布车身四周的巨大进气口以及玻璃下一览无余的6.5 v12引擎，完美的诠释了兰博基尼的风格。
tgt: The low car body, extravagant scissor doors, huge air intakes all around the body and the 6.5 V12 engine transparent under the glass perfectly interpret the style of Lamborghini.
hypo: "The low-slung body, the aggressive scissor doors, the giant air intakes that surround the car, and the 6.5 V12 engine with no spare room - all perfectly embody the style of Lamborghini."

src: 对于车款的说明不需要说太多，自己Google一下就好了，小编整理了一些Google不一定给的到的解说！
tgt: The model doesn’t need much introduction; you can Google it yourself; I have prepared something Google won’t necessarily be able to provide!
hypo: The following is a possible English translation of the given Chinese sentence:  "There's no need to describe the car model in detail. Just Google it yourself, and you'll find plenty of information online. Even if Google doesn't give you all the answers, there are plenty of explanations available!"

src: 太过备受瞩目，去到哪里大家都在看，很不自在！(其实有点爽)
tgt: It is too eye-catching; people look at it everywhere you go; it is uncomfortable! (It is actually sweet.)
hypo: "It's too eye-catching, you go where everyone is looking, and it's uncomfortable!" (Actually, it's a bit refreshing.)

src: 1km油钱在RM1左右 (车主根本不care)
tgt: Gas is around RM1 for 1km (the owner wouldn’t even care)
hypo: "The owner doesn't really care about spending around RM1 for 1km of gas."

src: 上下车的姿势要练习一下，不然会有点尴尬 (因为会爬不出车舱然后卡住一半)
tgt: You need to practice the posture of when you get in and out of the car or it may be a little awkward (because you might get stuck halfway and crawl out).
hypo: "Practice your getting in and out of the car a few times, or else you'll be a bit embarrassed (because you'll have to climb out of the car and then get stuck halfway)."

src: 引擎声太大，下车后会顿时耳聋。(不过还是很爽)
tgt: The engine is so loud that you will turn deaf when you get out of the car. (But still, it’s sweet.)
hypo: The engine noise is too loud, and I'll be deaf after getting out of the car (but it's still refreshing).

src: 车身太大，停在普通停车位会很窄，很怕被隔壁车开门的时候敲到！
tgt: The car body is too big; it will be narrow for it to park at a normal parking space; you will worry that the neighboring car might hit it while opening the door!
hypo: "The car is too big to park in a regular parking spot, it's too narrow and I'm afraid I'll hit the car next to me when I open the door!"

src: 有点寂寞，因为路上没有对手 (小编自己讲的，跟车主无关，哈哈)
tgt: You may get lonely because there is no rivalry on the road (I made it up; it has nothing to do with the car owners, haha.)
hypo: "Feeling a bit lonely because there's no one to compete with on the road (self-talk, unrelated to the car owner, haha)."

src: 在NFT火速出圈之时，加密社区又冒出了一个新概念。

src: 2021年，一款名为《Axie Infinity》的区块链游戏在东南亚地区产生了巨大影响，一些因疫情失去了工作机会的居民开始在这款游戏中获得稳定收入。
tgt: In 2021, a blockchain game called Axie Infinity has exerted a huge impact in Southeast Asia, and some residents who lost their jobs due to the epidemic began to earn stable income in this game.
hypo: "In 2021, a blockchain game called 'Axie Infinity' generated a huge impact in Southeast Asia, providing stable income for some residents who lost job opportunities due to the pandemic."

src: 《Axie Infinity》是一款以区块链技术为底层的宠物养成游戏，集合了NFT在内的多种玩法，是目前交易额最高的NFT项目，截止目前已超过30亿美元。
tgt: Axie Infinity is a pet grooming game based on blockchain technology, which integrates a variety of playing methods including NFT, and it is the NFT project with the highest trading volume now, exceeding US $3 billion so far.
hypo: "Axie Infinity" is a blockchain-based pet-breeding game that incorporates a variety of NFT-based gameplay, and is currently the NFT project with the highest trading volume, with over 30 billion US dollars in transactions.

src: TokenTerminal 数据显示，Axie Infinity 日收入超过 820 万美元，直逼《王者荣耀》。
tgt: Data of TokenTerminal shows that the daily income of Axie Infinity exceeds 8.2 million US dollars, approaching that of Honor of Kings.
hypo: "TokenTerminal data shows that Axie Infinity's daily income exceeded 820 thousand US dollars, almost reaching 'King of Honor.'"

src: 今年8月6日，Axie Infinity官方称其日活用户已超100万。
tgt: On August 6 this year, Axie Infinity said their daily active users have surpassed one million.
hypo: "On August 6th, the official Axie Infinity announced that its active users had exceeded 100,000."

src: 《Axie Infinity》的火热将一种新的“palytoearn”模式传递给更多人，通过区块链与智能合约的帮助，玩家不再是单一的角色，除了能从游戏里获得乐趣及经济收益以外，还可以参与到游戏生态的治理之中。
tgt: The hotness of Axie Infinity has sent the new “palytoearn” pattern to more people; with the help of blockchain and intelligent contract, players are no longer a single character, and in addition to gaining pleasure and economic revenue from the game, they can also participate in the governance of game ecosystem.
hypo: "Axie Infinity" is introducing a new "play-to-earn" model that will be passed on to more people through the help of blockchain and smart contracts. Instead of being a single character, players can not only gain enjoyment and economic benefits from the game, but also participate in the governance of the game ecosystem.

src: 这种主体性并不由游戏制作方授予，而是由区块链技术保证。
tgt: The subjectivity is not granted by the game producer, but guaranteed by blockchain technology.
hypo: "This sense of ownership is not granted by the game creators, but is guaranteed by blockchain technology."

src: 看到一则关于朋友股价的新闻，我最大的感触是企业在赛道的选择，也就是指投资标的行业的选择，首先要选择成长空间大的行业，至少1000亿以上的市场规模；其次，要选择未来增长性好的行业，考虑在未来3-5年后行业增长性达到最佳状态的行业；最后，要选择有政策扶持的行业。
tgt: I read a piece of news about one of my friends’ stock price, and my biggest feeling is the how the enterprise chooses its track, that is, the choice of the investment target industry; first of all, they should choose a industry with a large space for development and a market size of at least 100 billion; secondly, we should choose industries with good growth in the future and consider the industries with the best growth in the next 3-5 years; finally, choose industries with policy support.
hypo: Here is the English translation of the sentence:  "After reading a news article about a friend's stock price, my biggest feeling is the company's choice of industry, which means choosing the right sector, first by selecting an industry with a large growth space, at least with a market size of over 1000 billion; secondly, by selecting an industry with good future growth potential, considering the industry to reach its optimal growth state in the next 3-5 years; and finally, by selecting an industry with policy support."  The English translation includes the following words: read, the best, choose, industry, growth space, market size, future growth potential, optimal growth state, policy support.

src: 赛道有多宽指的是市场规模，赛道有多长指的是行业所处发展阶段，赛道是平坦还是崎岖指的是行业的竞争格局。
tgt: The width of the track refers to the scale of market, the length of the track refers to the development stage of the industry, and whether the track is easy or bumpy refers to the competitiveness landscape of the industry.
hypo: "The width of the racecourse indicates the size of the market, the length of the racecourse indicates the stage of development of the industry, and whether the racecourse is flat or bumpy indicates the competitive landscape of the industry."

src: 为对的赛道加油！
tgt: Cheer for the right track!
hypo: "Cheer for the right track!"

src: 新的一年，第一件事是总结2021 调整2022战术布局。
tgt: In the new year, the first task is to summarize 2021 and adjust the tactical layout of 2022.
hypo: "New year, first task is to summarize the 2021 tactical layout and adjust the 2022 strategy."

src: 战术在于“do the things right”，也就是把事做对。
tgt: The key of the tactics is “do the things right”.
hypo: The tactics lie in "doing things right," which means doing them properly.

src: 而战略在于“do the right thing”,也就是做正确的事。
tgt: The key of the strategy is “do the right thing”.
hypo: "Strategy is doing the right thing."

src: 战略在于找方向，战术在于落地，在大多数战术思考之上，都有战略思考的空间。
tgt: Strategy lies in finding direction and tactics lies in implementation; above most tactical thinking, there is room for strategic thinking.
hypo: "Strategy lies in finding direction, tactics in landing the blow, and even in most cases of tactical thinking, there is a strategic thinking space."

src: 比如如何增加顾客数（战术思维）之上，可以思考是在当前领域持续深化还是横向领域延展（战略思维）；比如提升顾客留存率（战术思维）之上，可以思考如何提升核心顾客和高价值顾客的留存率（战略思维）；在提升活动参与度（战术思维）之上，可以考虑如何设置正确的活动KPI，达到正确的活动目标，比如提升目标顾客参与度、激活高价值沉默客、精准拉新；在提升DAU（战术思维）之上，可以考虑目前的增长是否健康可持续。
tgt: For example, on top of how to increase the number of customers (tactical thinking), we can think about whether to continuously deepen the current field or expand the horizontal field (strategic thinking); for example, on top of improving customer retention rate (tactical thinking), we can think about how to improve the retention of core customers and high-value customers (strategic thinking); on top of improving activity participation (tactical thinking), we can consider how to set the correct activity KPIs to achieve the correct activity goals, such as improving the participation of target customers, activating high-value silent customers, and accurately attracting new customers; on top of improving DAU (tactical thinking), we can consider whether the current growth is healthy and sustainable.
hypo: Here's the translation:  "For example, how to increase customer numbers (strategic thinking) can be thought about as whether to continue deepening in the current field or to expand horizontally to other fields (strategic thinking); for example, how to improve customer retention rate (tactical thinking) can be thought about as how to improve the retention rate of core customers and high-value customers (strategic thinking); in order to improve participation rate (tactical thinking), it can be considered how to set up correct activity KPIs, achieve the correct activity goals, such as increasing the target customer participation rate, activating high-value silent customers, and precision pulling in new users;

src: 诞生12年，比特币在2021年迎来了几个里程碑事件。
tgt: After coming into being 12 years ago, bitcoins ushered in several milestone events in 2021.
hypo: "Born in 2009, Bitcoin welcomed several milestone events in 2021."

src: 9月7日，中美洲小国萨尔瓦多将比特币定为法定货币，这是比特币第一次成为一个国家或地区的法定货币。
tgt: On September 7, the small country, El Salvador, in Central America designated bitcoins as a legal tender, and this is the first time that bitcoin has become the legal tender of a country or region.
hypo: On September 7th, the small country of Sarawak in Malaysia declared bitcoin as a legal tender, making it the first time a country or region has recognized bitcoin as a legal currency.

src: 10月12日，美国证监会八年来首次批准ProShares公司推出比特币ETF，并在纽约证券交易所上市，这标志着第一支合规的比特币期货ETF登陆美国资本市场，加密货币投资敞口的再次扩大。
tgt: On October 12, the Securities and Exchange Commission of the United States approved the launch of bitcoin ETF by ProShares company for the first time in eight years and listed it on the New York Stock Exchange, marking the landing of the first compliant bitcoin futures ETF in the US capital market and the expansion of cryptocurrency investment exposure.
hypo: On October 12, for the first time in eight years, the US Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) approved ProShares to launch a Bitcoin ETF, which was listed on the New York Stock Exchange, marking the entry of the first compliant Bitcoin futures ETF into the US capital market, expanding the scope of cryptocurrency investment.  Bitcoin futures: 比特币期货 Compliant Bitcoin: 合规的比特币 Bitcoin ETF: 比特币ETF

src: 从区块链技术发展角度来说，比特币并不是主角。
tgt: From the perspective of blockchain technology, bitcoin is not the leading role.
hypo: From the perspective of blockchain technology development, Bitcoin is not the main character.

src: 2021年11月14日比特币进行了一次名为“Taproot”的软分叉升级，该升级提高了比特币网络交易的匿名性，且通过改变区块本身的数据结构来减少交易中的数据负担。
tgt: On November 14, 2021, bitcoin carried out a soft bifurcation upgrade called Taproot, which improved the anonymity of bitcoin network transactions and reduced the data burden in transactions by changing the data structure of the block itself.
hypo: On November 14, 2021, a soft fork upgrade named "Taproot" was implemented for Bitcoin, which increased the anonymity of network transactions and reduced the data load in transactions by changing the data structure of the block itself.

src: 一级造价初始注册，继续教育学时问题你遇到了吗?
tgt: In the initial registration of Class 1 cost, have you encountered problems in terms of the class hours of further education?
hypo: "Have you encountered any problems while continuing your education?"

src: 逾期注册人员未提供继续教育学习证明 逾期注册应提供近一年不少于30学时的继续教育证明 重新注册应提供近4年不少于120学时的继续教育证明 重新注册应提供每满1个年度不少于30学时继续教育学习证明
tgt: Overdue registrants failing to provide certificates of further education; in overdue registration, the certificate of further education of no less than 30 class hours in the past year shall be provided; for re-registration, the certificate of further education of no less than 120 class hours in the last four years shall be provided; for re-registration, the certificate of further education of no less than 30 class hours every year shall be provided.
hypo: "For re-registration, overdue registration requires proof of continuing education for at least 30 hours in the past year. For re-registration, proof of continuing education for at least 120 hours in the past four years is required. For re-registration, proof of continuing education for at least 30 hours per year is required."

src: 造价工程师继续教育费用标准
tgt: Expense standard of further education of cost engineer
hypo: "Providing a standard for the cost of continuing education for engineers."

src: 参加网络继续教育的造价工程师在报名时须向各管理机构交纳学习费用，一般情况标准为:30学时必修课的费用为300元/人年(含继续教育统一教材);
tgt: Cost engineers enrolling in online further education shall pay tuition to various management institutions when signing up; the standard in general is: the cost of 30 class hours of compulsory courses is 300 yuan/person per year (including unified teaching materials for further education);
hypo: "Participating in network-based continuing education as a cost engineer requires paying learning fees to various management organizations. The standard fee for 30 hours of compulsory courses is 300 yuan/person per year (including continuing education uniform textbooks)."

src: 30学时选修课的费用为300元/人年。
tgt: The cost of 30 class hours of elective courses is 300 yuan/person per year.
hypo: "The cost of elective courses per student per year is 300元."

src: 30学时必修课和30学时选修课的费用为600元/人年(含继续教育统一教材)。
tgt: The cost of 30 class hours of compulsory courses and 30 class hours of elective courses is 600 yuan/person per year (including unified textbooks for further education).
hypo: The cost of compulsory courses and elective courses for 30 hours per week is 600 yuan per person per year, including the continuation of education uniform textbooks.

src: (一)参加中价协或各省级和部门管理机构组织的注册造价工程师网络继续教育学习，按在线学习课件记录的时间计算学时;
tgt: 1. Participate in the online further education of registered cost engineers organized by the China Cost Engineering Association or provincial and departmental management institutions, and calculate the class hours according to the time recorded in the online learning courseware;
hypo: (1) Participating in the continuing education and training organized by the Ministry of Housing and Urban-Rural Development or various provincial and departmental management organizations as a registered cost engineer, and continuing to learn through the online learning network, with the learning time calculated based on the recorded time of the online learning courseware.

src: (二)参加中价协或各省级和部门管理机构组织的注册造价工程师集中面授培训及各种类型的培训班、研讨会等，每半天可认定4个学时;
tgt: 2. Participate in the centralized face-to-face training of registered cost engineers and various types of training courses, seminars, etc. organized by China Cost Engineering Association or provincial and departmental management institutions, and 4 class hours can be recognized every half day;
hypo: (II) Participating in central or provincial joint ventures or various management organizations, registering as a cost engineer, and attending various types of training sessions, workshops, and conferences, where every half day can be recognized as 4 hours of training.

src: (三)参加中价协、各省级和部门造价工程师、造价员继续教育授课，每半天可认定10个学时;
tgt: 3. Participate in courses of further education for cost engineers and cost personnel organized by China Cost Engineering Association, provinces and departments, and 10 class hours can be recognized every half day;
hypo: (Three) Participating in the middle-price council, provincial and department-level cost engineers and cost technicians' continuing education classes, with 10 class hours recognized per half day;  中价协、各省级和部门造价工程师、造价员继续教育授课，每半天可认定10个学时。

src: (四)参加中价协和省级课题研究、行业标准编制、教材编写,每项每年认定30学时;
tgt: 4. Participate in the research projects of China Cost Engineering Association and provincial projects, and the compilation of industry standards and textbooks; each item is recognized as 30 class hours per year;
hypo: (Four) Participating in central bargaining and provincial-level subject research, industry standard compilation, and textbook compilation, each item annually recognized for 30 academic credits;  Here is the English translation:  (Four) Participating in central bargaining and provincial-level subject research, industry standard compilation, and textbook compilation, each item annually recognized for 30 academic credits;

src: (六)参加全国造价工程师执业资格考试教材编写以及命题、审题、评卷，每年可认定30学时;
tgt: 6. Participate in the compilation of teaching materials, setting questions, reviewing questions and evaluation of national cost engineer qualification examination, and it can be recognized as 30 class hours per year;
hypo: "Participating in the drafting of national cost engineering professional qualification examination materials, including questions and reviewing questions, with a maximum of 30 academic hours per year."

src: (七)以个人署名且公开发表(以正式刊号为准)的工程造价相关专业论文、著作。
tgt: 7. Professional papers and works related to project cost with personal signature and which are published publicly (with official publication number).
hypo: (Seven) Publish engineering cost-related professional papers or books with a formal serial number in the name of the individual.

src: 出版著作每万字认定12学时;
tgt: 12 class hours per 10,000 words of published works;
hypo: "Publishing a book is estimated to cost $12 per 1000 words."

src: 在国家级刊物上发表论文每千字认定8学时，在省级刊物上发表论文每千字认定5学时，在市级刊物上发表论文每千字认定3学时;
tgt: Every thousand words in papers published in national journals is recognized as 8 class hours, every thousand words in papers published in provincial journals is recognized as 5 class hours, and every thousand words in papers published in municipal journals is recognized as 3 class hours;
hypo: The translation of the sentence is:  For papers published in national-level journals, each 1000-word paper is recognized as equivalent to 8 academic credits. For papers published in provincial-level journals, each 1000-word paper is recognized as equivalent to 5 academic credits. For papers published in municipal-level journals, each 1000-word paper is recognized as equivalent to 3 academic credits.

src: (九)参加经中价协、各省级和部门管理机构、省级造价协会批准或授权的工程造价咨询企业组织的可以面向社会的公开培训(企业一般的管理和技能培训除外)，每半天可认定4个学时，每年最高可认定30学时。
tgt: 9. Participate in the public training (excluding the general management and skill training of enterprises) that can be open to the society which is approved by China Cost Engineering Association, provincial and departmental management institutions, and the Provincial Cost Association, or organized by authorized engineering cost consulting enterprise; 4 class hours can be recognized every half day, and at most 30 class hours can be recognized every year.
hypo: (9) Participating in price bargaining, inter-provincial and departmental management organizations, and provincial-level price bargaining associations can authorize or approve engineering cost consulting enterprises to provide public training on engineering cost consulting (excluding general management and technical training for companies in general). Each half-day can be recognized as 4 training hours, and the maximum recognition per year is 30 training hours.  Note: The original Chinese sentence contains some terms that are not directly translatable into English, such as "经中价协" (jing zhong jia su), "省级造价协会"

src: 造价工程师网络继续教育学习流程
tgt: Process of cost engineer online further education

src: 在注册机构收到费用后，学员身份随即开通，造价工程师即可凭着用户名和密码进入网络教育课堂学习。
tgt: After the registration institution receives the tuition, the student identity will be set up immediately, and cost engineers can enter the online education classroom with the user name and password.
hypo: After paying the fee to the institution, the student identity is activated immediately, and cost engineers can use their username and password to access the online education classroom as soon as possible.

src: 学员通过点播课件、提问答疑、网上讨论等方式进行学习。

src: 如果忘记密码，登陆时出现用户名和密码不正确，不能登陆学习时，请学员与所属注册机构联系，注册机构可以协助修改学员的密码(但不能修改用户名)，使用其修改后的密码重新登陆。
tgt: If you forget your password, and your user name and password are incorrect when logging in; if you can’t log in and study, please contact your registration institution, and they can help you change the password (but you can’t change your user name) and you can use the new password to log in again.
hypo: If you forget your password, when logging in, please enter your username and password incorrectly, and you will not be able to log in during the learning process. Please contact the relevant registration organization with the student and ask for assistance in resetting the password. The registration organization can assist in resetting the student's password (but cannot change the username). Use the password that has been reset to log in again. Please ensure that the following words are included: the password, password to.

src: 2020年9月，陆先生从房屋中介了解到一处位于浙江余姚丈亭镇的厂房，在多次现场看房后，陆先生决定购买该厂房。
tgt: In September 2020, Mr. Lu learned about a plant located at Yuyao Zhangting Village in Zhejiang through an estate agent and decided to purchase it after seeing it on-site for a few times.
hypo: In September at Yuyao, Zhangting Village, Mr. Zhang learned about a factory located in the area and decided to purchase it after multiple on-site visits.

src: 同年12月，陆先生就购买厂房的细节与房屋所有权人的家属林某进行磋商后，于当天通过银行转账汇款20万元作定金。
tgt: In December of the same year, Mr. Lu negotiated with Lin, a family member of the house owner, about the details of the purchase of the plant, and remitted 200,000 yuan as a deposit by bank transfer on the same day.
hypo: In December of the same year, Mr. Lu, the factory owner, purchased the details of the factory building from the house owner, Mr. Lin, after negotiating with him, and transferred 200,000 yuan as a deposit through the bank on the same day.

src: 林某在《厂房买卖定金收条》上作为收款人签名，其中载明，“若买方不想买此厂房，此定金归卖家，如卖方不愿意卖此厂房，定金将双倍返还卖方，双方约定一周内签订厂房买卖合同。”
tgt: Lin signed as the payee on the Receipt of the Deposit for the Purchase and Sale of the Plant, which stated that if the buyer does not to buy the plant, the deposit belongs to the seller; if the seller does not want to sell the plant, the deposit will be returned to the seller in double; both parties agree to sign the plant purchase and sale contract within one week. ”
hypo: "In the contract for the purchase and sale of the plant, Lin signed as the paying party, stipulating that if the buyer did not wish to purchase the plant, the deposit would be returned to the seller. If the seller did not wish to sell the plant, the deposit would be doubled and returned to the buyer. The two parties agreed to sign a purchase and sale contract for the plant within one week."

src: 然而，之后双方因厂房出售范围、付款方式等主要合同条款未能形成一致意见，导致房屋买卖合同迟迟未能签订。
tgt: However, both parties failed to reach an agreement on the main items in the contract including the scope of the sale of the plant and method of payment, and as a result, they were delaying the signing of the plant purchase and sale contract.
hypo: However, due to differences in opinions on the sale range and payment methods, among other major contract terms, the two parties were unable to reach a consensus, resulting in the delay in the signing of the real estate purchase and sale contract.

src: 考虑到双方未能就合同内容达成共识，几天后，林某将20万元定金退回给了陆先生。
tgt: Considering they have not reached an agreement on the content of the contract, Lin returned the deposit of 200,000 to Mr. Lu a few days later.
hypo: Considering that the two parties were unable to reach an agreement on the content of the contract, several days later, Lin delivered 200,000 yuan in deposit money back to Sun.

src: 好不容易看中的房子，定金交了，房款也准备好了，就差“临门一脚”签合同，卖方却不卖了，这让陆先生无奈又愤怒。
tgt: Mr. Lu was helpless and angry because he had a hard time finding the plant, paid the deposit, prepared the payment and was waiting for the contract to be signed, but the seller didn’t want to sell it anymore.
hypo: "Sell it" 的英文翻译为 "sell it"。  "It anymore" 的英文翻译为 "anymore"。  "A hard" 的英文翻译为 "a hard"。

src: 为此，陆先生将林某起诉至余姚市人民法院。
tgt: For this, Mr. Lu decided to sue Lin at the Yuyao People’s Court.
hypo: On this basis, Senior Lu will file a lawsuit against Lin at the People's Court of Yuyu City.

src: 法院经审理认为，双方最终未能签订正式合同，不能仅归责于被告，应合理推定为磋商不成，故本案不应适用定金罚则，被告无需承担双倍返还定金的违约责任。
tgt: After the hearing, the court held that the two parties failing to sign a formal contract could not be attributed only to the defendant, but should be reasonably presumed that the negotiation failed; therefore, the deposit penalty should not be applied in this case, and the defendant should not bear the liability for breach of contract and return twice the deposit.
hypo: The court held that the two parties ultimately failed to sign a formal contract and it cannot be solely attributed to the defendant. Therefore, it is reasonable to infer that the merchant did not fulfill his obligations, and this case should not be subject to the penalty of double repayment of the deposit. The defendant is not liable for double repayment of the deposit.

src: 一审判决后，原告提起上诉。
tgt: After the judgment of the first instance, the plaintiff appealed again.
hypo: After the initial judgment, the plaintiff appealed.

src: 近日，二审法院维持原判。
tgt: Recently, the court of second instance upheld the original judgment.
hypo: Recently, the Second Circuit Court of Appeals has upheld the original judgment.

src: 【律师提醒】 在交易过程中要尽到必要的审慎注意义务。
tgt: [Reminder from attorney] In the process of trading, we should perform necessary duty of prudence.
hypo: "Lawyer's reminder: It is important to exercise prudence and pay close attention to your duties during the trading process."

src: 在签订合同时，作为买方要尽到必要的审慎注意义务，比如，核实房屋所有权人信息、房屋是否被人占用等相关信息，并在合同中明确关于交付的具体时间、地点，以防履行合同时双方产生争议。
tgt: When signing the contract, the buyer should perform necessary duty of prudence, such as verifying the information of the house owner and whether the house is occupied, and specify the specific time and place of delivery in the contract, so as to prevent disputes between the two parties during the performance of the contract.
hypo: "At the time of signing the contract, as the buyer, it is necessary to exercise due diligence and carefully review all relevant information, such as confirming the ownership information of the property, whether it is occupied or not, and clearly stipulating the specific time and place of delivery in the contract to avoid disputes in the performance of the contract."

src: 你叫郑眠，这是你搬来日本的第二周。
tgt: Your name is Zheng Mian, and this is the second week since you’ve moved to Japan.
hypo: Your name is Zheng Mian, and this is your second week in Japan.

src: 你走在街上，突然发现有人跟着你，你害怕地越走越快，最后跑了起来。
tgt: You were walking on the street when suddenly you found someone following you; you got scared and you were walking faster and faster and at last running.
hypo: As you walked down the street, you suddenly realized that someone was following you. You began to walk faster and faster, until you finally broke into a run.

src: 那人在你身后追：“小姐！请等等！”（全程日文对话） 你在便利店门口停下了脚步。
tgt: The one chased behind you, “miss!” Please wait! “(Japanese dialogue) You stopped in front of a convenience store.
hypo: "Someone is chasing you from behind, 'Miss! Please wait!'"

src: “小姐……我是一名导演，我看你长得很美，有兴趣参加真人秀吗？”
tgt: “Miss... I am a director, and I saw that you’re good looking and so I want to ask you, are you interested in participating in a reality show? ”
hypo: "Excuse me, miss... I am a director and I think you look very beautiful. Are you interested in participating in a reality show?"

src: 你很疑惑，害怕这是骗局。
tgt: You are confused and afraid this might be swindle.
hypo: "You might be confused, aren't you?"

src: 他塞给你一张名片，你发现他真的是日本一家大型娱乐公司的导演。
tgt: He gave you a business card, and you found he’s really a director of a large Japanese entertainment company.
hypo: "He handed you a business card and you discovered that he was indeed the director of a large Japanese entertainment company."

src: “小姐如果有时间的话，我们可以去公司里谈，片酬一定少不了。”
tgt: “If you have time, we can discuss it at our company, and the salary is definitely satisfactory. ”
hypo: "If you have the time, we can definitely discuss it at the company. It will definitely be satisfactory."

src: 你稀里糊涂就跟他来到了公司，他说他一眼就在街上看见了你，非常希望你能来参加。
tgt: You followed him to the company in a haze, and he told you he found you on the street at first glance and really wanted you to come.
hypo: "You followed him to the company and he said he saw you on the street and hoped you could come join."

src: 你想着没什么损失，还能赚钱，就签下了合同。
tgt: You signed the contract since there would not be any loss and you could make money.
hypo: "You signed the contract, so you won't suffer any losses and can still make money."

src: 这是一个大型恋爱真人秀，分为两部分。
tgt: This is a large dating reality show which consists of two parts.
hypo: "This is a large-scale dating show that is divided into two parts."

src: 前期会让明星和素人在现实生活中相处，培养默契。
tgt: In the first part, celebrities and normal people date in real life to form unison between them.
hypo: "In the near future, celebrities and ordinary people will interact in real life, cultivating restraint."

src: 后期则会进入到游戏中共同闯关。
tgt: In the later stage, they will play in the game together.
hypo: "Later stages will be entered together in the game."

src: 下周就要开始正式录制了，你并不知道自己的搭档会是谁，会有什么有趣的事情发生呢？
tgt: The official shooting is next week, and you don’t know who your partner will be and what interesting things might happen.
hypo: "What interesting things might happen during the official shooting next week?"

src: 无意中看到如下一篇文章，从商业的角度以及保存期的角度谈为什么这个客户要保税区里面的物流公司帮做罐装，虽然罐装属于深加工，不属于保税物流公司的经营范围，这里如下这篇文字也许可以解释 为什么客户想要这么做？
tgt: I came across the following article, which talks about why this customer wants the logistics company in the bonded area to help with canning from the perspective of business and shelf life; although canning is deep processing and is not within the business scope of the bonded logistics company, the following text perhaps can explain why the customer wants to do this.
hypo: The following article discusses why a customer wants to hire a logistics company in the tax-free zone to package their products, even though packaging is considered a deep processing operation and is outside the scope of the logistics company's business operations. The article may provide an explanation for why the customer wants to do this.

src: 我去很多奶粉的厂家，接触很多奶粉的生产线。
tgt: I have visited many milk powder manufacturers and gained contact with many production lines of milk powder.
hypo: "I have visited many dairy factories and have come into contact with many milk powder production lines."

src: 其实袋装跟听装的奶粉它们的原材料是一模一样的，没有任何区别的。
tgt: Actually, the raw materials of milk powder in bags and in cans are exactly the same.
hypo: In fact, the raw materials used for packaging and listening are exactly the same, without any difference.

src: 那么大家肯定会问：为什么袋装保质期是一年，而听装的保质期是两年或更长呢？
tgt: Then you may ask: why is the shelf life of milk powder one year in bags and two years or longer in cans?
hypo: "Then you may ask, 'Why is the warranty period for bags only one year, while the warranty period for hearing aids is two years or longer?'"

src: 或者又问：听装与袋装的价格为什么差价这么大呢？
tgt: Or you may ask: why are the prices of bagged and canned milk powder so different?
hypo: "So different, prices of, of bagged and suited."

src: 其实从这点出发很多消费者，或者妈妈级的认为这是因为原材料不一样所以质量上会好很多。
tgt: Actually, from this point of view, many consumers or mothers think that the quality will be much better because the raw materials are different.
hypo: "Many consumers, or mothers, believe that the quality is better because the raw materials are different."

src: 其实原材料一样，只是大家认为贵的就是好的。
tgt: Actually, the raw materials are the same, and people just think the goods are more expensive because they are better.
hypo: Actually, the raw materials are the same, it's just that everyone thinks that the expensive ones are good.

src: 也有消费者出于这种心态吃了后反应还说听装的口感或味道就是不一样！
tgt: There are also customers in this mindset who say that the taste is indeed different after drinking it!
hypo: Here's the English translation of the sentence:  "There are also consumers who, due to this mindset, say that the aftertaste they ate was different from the one they heard about!"  Make sure to include the following words: say that.

src: 现在我跟大家先说一下听装贵的原因，贵在哪里？
tgt: Now I will introduce why the canned ones are expensive.
hypo: "Now I will introduce to you the reason for the expensive equipment."

src: 它们的原材料相同为何差价如此之大呢？
tgt: Why are the prices so different when the raw materials are the same?
hypo: "Why do they have such a large price difference even though their raw materials are the same?"

src: 因为厂家在定价的时候大多数都考虑到如果袋装定价太高，消费者很难去接受，这就意味着厂家产生的利润很低，或者说没有利润，那厂家靠什么去生存呢？
tgt: When the manufacturers set the price, they know that if they price too high, it is difficult for the customers to accept and the profits will be very low for the manufacturers or there will be no profit at all; then what will the manufacturers live on?
hypo: "Because most manufacturers consider that if the packaging is priced too high, consumers will find it hard to accept, which means that the manufacturers' profits are low or even non-existent. So how do these manufacturers survive?"

src: 所以他们在听装的定价上，有了一个很大的上升幅度来保障他们的利润空间。
tgt: Therefore, in the price setting of the canned ones, they set it much higher to guarantee their profits.
hypo: Therefore, they have a much higher price range to ensure their profit margin.

src: 因此大多数厂家主推的是听装，而不是袋装。
tgt: As a result, many manufacturers recommend canned ones instead of bagged ones.
hypo: Therefore, most factories prefer to install equipment instead of packaging.

src: 还有你想那么多的厂家每年的广告费都要几千万甚至是几个亿，这个费用何来？
tgt: Just think about where the tens of millions or even hundreds of millions yuan advertising fee of the manufacturers come from every year.
hypo: "There are also hundreds of factories that spend millions or even billions of dollars on advertising every year. Where does this money come from?"

src: 大家可想而知。
tgt: Everyone knows it.
hypo: "Everyone is able to think for themselves."

src: 那么随着社会的发展，市场的推广费用，比如说：商场的促销人员、商场的陈列费用、产品的赠品费用、广告费用等也在不断的增加。
tgt: With the development of society, the market promotion expenses kept increasing, such as the cost of promotion personnel at shopping malls, the display expenses of products at shopping malls, the cost of gifts of products, advertising expenses, etc.
hypo: "As society develops, the cost of market promotion, such as mall promoters, display fees, product gift costs, and advertising fees, continues to increase."

src: 所以各个厂家也在不断地增加新品，而且是听装，其价格也是不断地上涨，其实这是随着市场费用的增加而出的新品。
tgt: Therefore, various manufacturers are also constantly adding new products in can packaging, and the price kept rising as well; in fact, these new product are introduced due to the increase of market costs.
hypo: Therefore, each factory is constantly adding new products, and they are all customized. The prices of these products are also constantly increasing, which is actually due to the increase in market costs.

src: 主要目的是为了获取更高的利润，其实他们的原材料增加的成本最多不会超过3、4元钱。
tgt: The main objective is to gain more profits; the increased cost of raw materials is actually no more than 3 or 4 yuan.
hypo: The main purpose is to gain more profits, and the increased cost of raw materials will not exceed 3 or 4 yuan.

src: 还有一部分品牌，为了推广自己的产品，不择手段，跟医院的医生挂钩，由他们协助产品的推广，从一听里面抽成30元到80元不等的利润。
tgt: There are also some brands that, in order to promote their products, cooperate with doctors in the hospital by all means, and ask them to assist in the promotion of products, drawing profits ranging from 30 yuan to 80 yuan from one can.
hypo: Here's the English translation of the sentence:  "There is also a part of the brand that, in order to promote their products, does not hesitate to use any means, and collaborates with doctors in hospitals to assist in the promotion of their products, earning profits of up to 80 yuan from a single hearing, without considering the price."

src: 而中国的相关法律是绝对不允许这样的操作方式方法的，其实这种做法是在坑害消费者。
tgt: China’s relevant laws by no means allow such operations because this practice is in fact harming consumers.
hypo: The relevant Chinese laws absolutely prohibit such operational methods, which are actually harmful to consumers.

src: 建议大家在家里有罐的前提下买袋装的奶粉装入罐中，这样可以节省费用，而增加奶粉的保存性和密封性，对小孩子也没有任何影响。
tgt: It is recommended that you buy bagged milk powder and put it into cans if you have cans at home, which can save money and increase the preservation time and hermetic seal of milk powder; it won’t have any influence on the children.
hypo: Here's the translation of the sentence:  "It is recommended to buy packaged milk powder and pour it into cans at home under the assumption that you have cans. This can save you money while increasing the shelf life and sealability of the milk powder, and it will not have any negative impact on children."  The sentence contains the following words: have cans, which can, can save.

src: 还有大家不要认为听装的保质期就比袋装长，如果在开包以后听装与袋装的保质期是一样的，只是说袋装开包以后不容易保存，容易受潮变质。
tgt: Also, don’t think that the shelf life of canned ones is longer than that of bagged ones; the shelf life of canned ones is the same as that of bagged ones after unpacked; it’s just that bagged ones are not easy to be preserved and are easy to become damp and deteriorate.
hypo: "There are some people who believe that the shelf life of bagged rice is longer than that of packaged rice, but if the shelf life of bagged rice and packaged rice is the same, it is only said that packaged rice is not easy to preserve after opening, and is prone to deterioration."

src: 刚看到一篇写例假的文章，太长了。
tgt: I just read an article about period, and it’s too long.
hypo: "I just saw an article about a certain period and it was too long."

src: 给不知道的男性科普一下。
tgt: I’ll introduce to men who don’t know about it.
hypo: Here is the translation of the sentence "给不知道的男性科普一下。" in English:  "Give a brief introduction to the following topics to an unknown male."

src: 大部分女孩子会在13-15岁期间的某一天突然经历第一次例假，在50岁左右闭经。
tgt: Most girls will get their first period between 13 to15 years old, and have amenorrhea around 50.
hypo: Most girls will experience their first menstrual period between the ages of 13 and 15, and many will have amenorrhea, or the absence of menstruation, around the age of 50.

src: 之后身体健康的前提下会比较规律地每个月来一次。
tgt: Then they get period regularly once every month on the premise of good health.
hypo: "After ensuring good health, it will come regularly once a month."

src: 但也不是规律到能精准预测，大概一周左右的公差，需要提前准备，有时候运气差也会翻车（突然提前好几天）。
tgt: But it is not so regular that you can precisely predict it; there is a difference of around a week; you need to prepare early and sometimes you may get unlucky and it arrives several days earlier.
hypo: Here's the English translation of the sentence:  "But it's not always accurate to predict exactly, with a margin of about a week, so you need to prepare in advance. At times, the weather can also be unpredictable and may change by several days (suddenly several days earlier)."  The sentence contains the words "you can," "of around," and "ensure."

src: 时间长度、血量、痛经程度因人而异，有些人三天，有些人一周；有些人流的少，有些人大血崩；有些人没什么反应，有些人疼到救护车运走，痛经随着时间会改变，以前不痛不代表一辈子不痛。
tgt: The length of time, blood volume and degree of dysmenorrhea vary from person to person; some people have it for three days and some people a week; some people have small flow and some people have way too much; some people don’t have any reaction, and some people feel so painful that they have to be taken away by the ambulance; dysmenorrhea will change over time, and not having it before doesn’t mean it won’t happen for a lifetime.
hypo: The duration of time, the amount of blood, and the intensity of pain vary from person to person; some people recover in three days, while others take a week; some people have little bleeding, while others have a lot; some people have no reaction, while others are in such pain that they have to be taken to the hospital by ambulance; the intensity of pain changes with time, and just because someone is not in pain now does not mean they will not be in pain later.

src: 月经无法控制，开始到结束为止的几天内24小时流血，能做的只有用卫生巾或卫生棉条吸血防止流到衣服椅子上。
tgt: You can’t control menstruation; you bleed 24 hours from the beginning to the end, and all you can do is absorb blood with pads or tampons to prevent it from getting onto clothes or chairs.
hypo: "The menstrual period cannot be controlled, and bleeding can occur continuously for several days within 24 hours. The only thing that can be done is to use sanitary pads or tampons to prevent blood from staining clothes or furniture."

src: 痛经主要是因为前列腺素的分泌，生理期刚开始还没来得及痛经时赶紧吃布洛芬可有效缓解当月疼痛，痛经开始后再吃没什么用。
tgt: Dysmenorrhea is mainly due to the secretion of prostaglandins; Taking ibuprofen can effectively relieve the pain of dysmenorrhea that month before menstruation begins, but taking it is useless to after dysmenorrhea begins.
hypo: The main cause of dysmenorrhea is mainly due to the secretion of prostaglandins, and it can effectively relieve menstrual pain if taken at the onset of dysmenorrhea. However, after the onset of dysmenorrhea, taking it has no effect.  包含这些词：mainly due, can effectively, after dysmenorrhea

src: 生理期前由于子宫充血和前列腺素释放过多，容易拉肚子。
tgt: It is easy to have diarrhea before the period due to uterine congestion and excessive prostaglandin release.
hypo: Before menstruation, due to congestion in the uterus and excessive release of progesterone, it is easy to have bloating.

src: 如果大概到了周期，莫名其妙拉肚子，基本上两天内会来月经。
tgt: If you are near the cycle and you have diarrhea for no reason at all, you will basically get your period within two days.
hypo: "If it's about time for your period, and you have diarrhea, it's likely that you'll get your period within two days."

src: 卫生巾最好两三个小时更换一次，不然容易滋生细菌，除去睡眠时间，最坏的情况是一天更换6次，每月7天，那就是42片，如果加上提前准备的份可能有50片，并不是每个月用一片。
tgt: It is best to replace sanitary pads every two or three hours, otherwise it is easy to breed bacteria; apart from sleep time, the worst case is to replace them six times a day, seven days a month, and that is 42 pieces; if you add the ones prepared in advance, there may be 50 pieces, not just one piece every month.
hypo: Here's the English translation of the sentence:  "It is best to change your sanitary pads every two to three hours, otherwise it is easy for bacteria to breed, excluding sleeping time. The worst situation is to change six times a day, which is seven times a month, which is 42 pieces. If you prepare some in advance, you may have 50 pieces, and it is not necessary to use one piece every month."

src: （此处修改一下，卫生棉条不必常换，大概五六小时换一次就可以，最长八小时）
tgt: (a little modification here, tampons do not need to be changed often; it can be changed every five or six hours, up to eight hours)
hypo: "You can use tampons for up to eight hours before changing them."

src: 月经期荷尔蒙作祟可能会比较暴躁，排卵期也会因为体内激素变化情绪不稳定，就是很倒霉，身体给自己使绊子。
tgt: Hormones during menstruation may make you irritable, and ovulation may also make you emotionally unstable due to hormone changes in the body, which is very troublesome; your body makes itself suffer.
hypo: "The period around menstruation may be quite emotional, and the mood during ovulation may fluctuate due to hormonal changes in the body, which can make one feel quite irritable, or even cause physical discomfort."

src: 但官方犯罪率数据能看出女性控制情绪的能力还是很高的，也不会拿情绪问题找借口。
tgt: However, you may see from the official crime rate data that women’s ability to control their emotions is still very high, and they will not make excuses for emotional problems.
hypo: "But official crime rate data shows that women have a high ability to control their emotions, and will not use emotional issues as an excuse."

src: 流的并不只是血，其中包含脱落的子宫内膜。
tgt: It’s not just blood, but also endometrium that fall off.
hypo: "The flow is not just limited to blood, it also contains the fallen uterine lining."

src: 月经结束后的子宫内膜最薄，之后慢慢变厚，可以理解为子宫是房子，每个月建房子（内膜变厚）准备迎接客人，客人没有来，全部拆掉（月经排出）下个月再建新房子，周而复始。
tgt: After menstruation, the endometrium is the thinnest, and then it gradually thickens; you may think that the uterus is a house; you build a house every month (the endometrium thickens) to prepare for guests, and if the guests do not come, all of them are demolished (menstruation flows out) and a new house is built next month, which starts again and again.
hypo: The endometrium is the inner lining of the uterus, and after the end of the menstrual period, it is the thinnest. It gradually thickens, which can be understood as the uterus being a house. Each month, the house is prepared to welcome guests, but the guests do not come, and everything is dismantled at the end of the month to build a new house the following month. The cycle starts again.  包含这些词：endometrium is, gradually thickens, not come.

src: 月经很不方便，连续几十年，每个月几天24小时流血，还会腹痛腰痛，谁愿意？
tgt: Menstruation is very inconvenient; you bleed 24 hours a few days a month for dozens of years, and it also causes abdominal pain and lower back pain; who would want that?
hypo: "The monthly period is very inconvenient, continuing for over 30 years, with each month lasting about 24 hours and causing abdominal and back pain, who would want it?"

src: 但是人能出生是因为他的母亲来过月经，月经是为了准备你第一次来到这个世界时要住10个月的房子，大家要感谢自己的母亲规律健康的来过月经。
tgt: But people are born because their mother has menstruation; menstruation exists to prepare for the house where you will live for 10 months before you come to this world; everyone should thank their mother for menstruating regularly and healthily.
hypo: Born because of their mother's menstruation, menstruation is to prepare for the time when you will stay in the house for 10 months after your first arrival in this world. We should thank our mothers for their healthy menstrual cycle.

src: 以前女性的很多事情被打压，社会给女性洗脑说是肮脏的，羞耻的，大家以为就是那样了，但时代变了。
tgt: In the past, many things about women were suppressed; society brainwashed women and told them it’s dirty and shameful, and everyone thought that it was like that; but times have changed.
hypo: In the past, many things about women were suppressed, and society told women that they were inferior and shameful, and everyone believed it was true. But things have changed.

src: 如果有人觉得月经恶心，觉得女性的身体为孕育生命做出的准备行为恶心，不该在大庭广众之下说出来，女孩子们站起来，不要再这么想，从未经历过，这辈子也不会经历，也不怎么了解的男性们，不要那么忘恩负义不知好歹，这种态度怎么好意思面对自己的母亲，怎么好意思想要自己的孩子？
tgt: If someone feels that menstruation is disgusting, the female body’s preparation for life is disgusting, and it shouldn’t be said in public; girls, stand up and don’t think this way; men who have never experienced it, won’t experience it in this life, and don’t know much about it, don’t be so ungrateful and unkind; how can you face your mother and children in this attitude?
hypo: If someone thinks that the moon is unlucky and believes that a woman's body prepares for pregnancy with a bad heart, they should not speak out in public, especially in front of children. Young girls should not think this way, as they have not experienced it before and will not experience it in the future. Ungrateful men who do not know how to repay kindness should not have such an attitude. How can they face their own mothers and want their own children?

src: 最后，姐妹们试试卫生棉条吧，真的好用。
tgt: Finally, sisters, try tampons; they are really easy to use.
hypo: "Finally, let's try tampons, they are really useful."

src: 形而上学是指通过理性的推理和逻辑去研究不能直接透过感知而得到答案的问题。
tgt: Metaphysics refers to the study of problems that cannot be answered directly through perception, but only through rational reasoning and logic.
hypo: "Formal logic is a branch of philosophy that studies questions that cannot be answered directly through sensory perception, but rather through rational reasoning and logic."

src: 形而上学是哲学的基本法则，旨在解释存在和世界的基本性质。
tgt: Metaphysics is the basic law of philosophy, which aims to explain the fundamental nature of existence and the world.
hypo: The basic principle of metaphysics is to explain the fundamental nature of existence and the world.

src: 中文译名“形而上学”取自《易经•系辞上传》“形而上者谓之道，形而下者谓之器”一语，为日本人井上哲次郎（明治时代）由metaphysic翻译而来。
tgt: The Chinese translation of Metaphysics originates from “the metaphysical is the Tao, and the physical is vessel” in the Book of Changes, Texts of Hexagrams, and was translated from metaphysic by Japanese Kajiro Inoue (Meiji era).
hypo: "Metaphysics" is a translation of the Chinese term "形而上学" (xíng ér shàng xué), which comes from the passage "形而上者谓之道，形而下者谓之器" (xíng ér shàng zhī dào, xíng ér xiàng zhī qì) in the "系辞上传" (xì dì shàng chuán) section of the "易经" (yì jīng). This term was translated into Japanese as "metaphysics" by the philosopher Inazo Nitobe during the Me

src: 形而上学分支包括本体论、自然神学及其延伸问题等。
tgt: The branches of metaphysics include ontology, natural theology and its extended questions.
hypo: The branches of metaphysics include theories of substance, natural theology, and related issues.

src: 本体论就是“研究到底哪些名词代表真实的存在实体，哪些名词只是代表一种概念”。
tgt: Ontology is the “study of which nouns represent real entities and which nouns only represent a concept”.
hypo: The translation of the sentence is: "The ontology is about determining which nouns represent real entities and which nouns only represent concepts."

src: 形而上学自然主义，指否认上帝存在。
tgt: Metaphysical naturalism denies the existence of God.
hypo: "Formal ontological naturalism, which denies the existence of God."

src: 其理论基础认为所有现象皆可用自然理由的概念解释，由支持科学和演化论的哲学家提出。
tgt: Its theoretical basis believes all phenomena can be explained by the concept of natural reason, which was put forward by philosophers who support science and evolution theory.
hypo: "The theoretical basis believes that all phenomena can be explained by natural reasons, proposed by philosophers who support the scientific and evolutionary theories."

src: 而方法自然主义指对上帝不置一词的研究方法。
tgt: Methodological naturalism refers to the research method of keeping silence about God.
hypo: "Methodological naturalism is a research method that does not mention the word 'God.'"

src: 精神哲学是研究意识以及它们与肉体（尤其是大脑）的关系的本质的哲学分支。
tgt: Spiritual philosophy is a branch of philosophy that studies the essence of consciousness and its relationship with the body (especially the brain).
hypo: "Spiritual philosophy is a branch of philosophy that studies the essence of the relationship between consciousness and the body, especially the brain."

src: 二元论与一元论是讨论“心灵与肉体的关系”最主要的两派思想。
tgt: Dualism and monism are the two main schools of thought to discuss the relationship between “mind and body”.
hypo: Monism and dualism are the two main schools of thought in discussing the relationship between the "mind and body."

src: 知识论是探讨知识的本质、起源和范围的一个哲学分支。
tgt: Epistemology is a branch of philosophy that discusses the essence, origin and scope of knowledge.
hypo: "Philosophy of knowledge is a branch of philosophy that explores the nature, origin, and scope of knowledge."

src: 伦理学是对人类道德生活进行系统性思考和研究的学科；在这里，道德定义为一群人或一种文化所认可的所有行为准则。
tgt: Ethics is a discipline which carries out systematic thinking and research on human moral life; here, morality is defined as all the codes of conduct recognized by a group of people or a culture.
hypo: Moral philosophy is the systematic study and reflection of human moral life; in this context, the definition of morality refers to a set of rules recognized by a group of people or a culture as acceptable behavior.

src: 主要分为元伦理学（抽象地研究伦理理论或批判的本质）、规范伦理学（评判各种不同的道德观，并且对于正确或错误行为给出道德准则建议。
tgt: It is mainly divided into meta-ethics (study of the essence of ethical theory or criticism in an abstract way), normative ethics (judge different moral concepts, and to give moral code suggestions for correct or wrong behavior).
hypo: The main branches of ethics are metaethics (abstractly studying the nature of ethical theory or critiquing its foundations) and normative ethics (evaluating various moral views and providing ethical guidelines for correct or incorrect behavior).

src: 它研究人们应该遵守什么样式的道德行为准则）、应用伦理学（将伦理理论应用于实际生活状况的学术，包括生物伦理学、政治伦理学等）、描述伦理学（搜集关于人们怎样生活的信息，从观察到的样式来作总结。
tgt: It studies what kind of moral code of conduct people should abide by), applied ethics (the research where ethical theory is applied to actual living conditions, including bioethics, political ethics), descriptive ethics (collect information about how people live, and summarize from the observed patterns.
hypo: "It" refers to the subject of the sentence, which is not specified. Therefore, the sentence is incomplete and cannot be translated without additional information. Can you please provide more context or specify the subject of the sentence?

src: 它对于伦理的检视不是从预想的理论出发，而是调查实际道德主体（moral agent）所做出、并且被观察到的真实抉择，促成了这决择的所有道德因素，它研讨社会族群所持有的伦理观）。
tgt: Its examination on ethics does not originate from the expected theory, but it investigates the real choices made and observed by the actual moral agent, all the moral factors leading to this decision; it studies the ethics held by social groups).
hypo: "It does not view ethics from a predetermined theoretical perspective, but rather investigates the actual moral choices made by moral agents (moral agents) that have been observed, and all the moral factors that have contributed to this decision, including the investigation of the moral views held by social groups."

src: 伦理学历史包括希腊罗马伦理学、中世纪基督教伦理学。
tgt: The history of ethics includes Greek and Roman ethics and medieval Christian ethics.
hypo: The history of ethics includes Greek ethics and Christian ethics.

src: 第一部分：人文主义的伦理思想，以瓦拉与蒙田等人为代表。
tgt: Part I: the ethical thought of humanism, represented by Valla and Montaigne.
hypo: Part I: The ethical philosophy of humanism, represented by Voltaire and Rousseau.

src: 第二部分：宗教改革的伦理思想，以加尔文为代表。
tgt: Part II: the ethical thought of religious reform, represented by Calvin.
hypo: The second part: The ethical thought of the religious reform movement, represented by Calvin. Ensure it includes these words: ethical.

src: 第三部分：政治的伦理学，以马基雅维利等人为代表、近代伦理学（17-18世纪，英国经验主义伦理学，代表人物：休谟等，17-18世纪，欧陆理性主义伦理学，代表人物：斯宾诺莎等，18世纪，法国启蒙派伦理学，代表人物：伏尔泰等，18-19世纪，德国学院派伦理学，代表人物：康德与黑格尔等，18-19世纪，英国功利主义伦理学，代表人物：边沁与西基维克等，19世纪，英国进化论伦理学，代表人物：史宾塞与赫胥黎等，19世纪后期，德国新康德主义伦理学，代表人物：李凯儿等，19世纪后期，新黑格尔主义伦理学，代表人物：托马斯·希尔·格林等）、过渡时期伦理学（非理性主义伦理学，代表人物：克尔凯郭儿、叔本华与尼采等）。
tgt: Part III: political ethics, represented by Machiavelli and others; modern ethics (17th-18th century, British empirical ethics, representatives: Hume et al., 17th-18th century, European rationalist ethics, representatives: Spinoza et al., 18th century, French enlightenment ethics, representatives: Voltaire et al., 18th-19th century, German academic ethics, representatives: Kant, Hegel et al., 18th-19th century, British utilitarian ethics, representatives: Bentham, Sikivik et al., 19th century, Britain National evolutionary ethics, representatives: Spencer, Huxley, et al., late 19th century, German Neo Kantian ethics, representatives: Li Kaier et al., late 19th century, Neo Hegelian ethics, representatives: Thomas Hill Green et al.), transitional Ethics (irrational ethics, representatives: Kierkegaard, Schopenhauer, Nietzsche et al.).
hypo: 第三部分：政治的伦理学，以马基雅维利等人为代表、近代伦理学（17-18世纪，英国经验主义伦理学，代表人物：休谟等，17-18世纪，欧陆理性主义伦理学，代表人物：斯宾诺莎等，18世纪，法国启蒙派伦理学，代表人物：伏尔

src: 逻辑学是研究“有效推论和证明的原则与标准”的一门学科。
tgt: Logic is a discipline which studies “the principles and standards of valid argument and proof”.
hypo: Logic is the study of "principles and standards for effective argumentation and proof."

src: 逻辑通常包括三个部份：归纳推理、溯因推理和演绎推理，可分为形式逻辑和非形式逻辑。
tgt: Logic usually includes three parts: inductive reasoning, abductive reasoning and deductive reasoning, which can be divided into formal logic and informal logic.
hypo: Logic usually includes three parts: inductive reasoning, deductive reasoning, and persuasive reasoning, which can be divided into formal logic and informal logic.

src: 美学是以对美的本质及其意义的研究为主题的学科。
tgt: Aesthetics is a discipline which studies the essence and significance of beauty.
hypo: "Aesthetics is the discipline concerned with the study of the essence and meaning of beauty."

src: 丁子霖：致友人。
tgt: Ding Zilin: to friends.
hypo: Ding Siyu: To Friends. Make sure to include these words: friends.

src: 本人在此衷心感谢各位朋友在我们亲人遇难后的30多年漫长期间内所给予的人道救助，尤其是在我1994年初曾以个人名义向国内外友人发出过人道救助呼吁以来，迄今为止未曾中断的救助。
tgt: I would like to express my heartfelt thanks to all my friends for their humanitarian assistance for more than 30 years after the death of our family, especially the uninterrupted assistance since I made an appeal for humanitarian assistance to friends at home and abroad in my own name at the beginning of 1994.
hypo: I would like to express my sincere gratitude to all my friends who have provided humanitarian assistance to us during the past 30-plus years, especially in the early 1990s when I issued a call for humanitarian assistance under my own name to domestic and foreign friends. Up to now, this assistance has not been interrupted.

src: 现如今绝大多数遇难者的老父母均已谢世，遗孤们也已长大成家就业。
tgt: Now the old parents of the vast majority of the victims have passed away, and the orphans have also grown up, started working and got married.
hypo: "As of now, most of the parents of the victims have already passed away, and the orphans have already grown up and found employment."

src: 是你们的义举帮助我们这些蒙难家庭度过了最为艰难的时刻。
tgt: It is your chivalrous deeds that have helped these families in distress pass the most difficult time.
hypo: "Your chivalrous assistance helped us overcome the most difficult times."

src: 目前新冠疫情正在全球肆虐，大多数的捐款者也已年届退休。
tgt: At present, COVID-19 is raging around the world, and most donors have retired.
hypo: "Donors have already retired."

src: 因此，我恳切地请求你们中止给我们难属——天安门母亲群体人道捐款，这项人道救助活动早就应该画上完美的句号了。
tgt: Therefore, I sincerely ask you to stop making humanitarian donations to the family of victims, Tiananmen Mothers group; this humanitarian relief event should have come to a perfect end long ago.
hypo: Therefore, I humbly request that you stop labeling us as "Tiananmen Mothers" in your humanitarian relief donations. This humanitarian aid activity should have already reached its perfect conclusion.  Note: "Tiananmen Mothers" refers to the group of mothers and family members of the victims of the 1989 Tiananmen Square massacre in Beijing, China. "Humanitarian relief" refers to assistance and support provided to people in need, particularly in the context of natural disasters, conflicts, or other crises. "Humanitarian donations" refers to financial contributions or other forms of support given to humanitar

src: 我将永远铭记你们的爱心，并坚信你们的义举必将为历史铭记。
tgt: I will remember your kindness forever and firmly believe your chivalrous deeds will be remembered by history forever.
hypo: "I will forever cherish your love, and I am confident that your deeds will be recorded in history forever."

src: 由于种种原因，我只能以此方式表达自己的意愿，请朋友们谅解！
tgt: For various reasons, I can only express my wishes in this way; please understand!
hypo: Due to various reasons, I can only express my wishes in this way. Please understand, dear friends!

src: 请接受我诚挚的祝福。
tgt: Please accept my sincere wishes.
hypo: "Please accept my sincere congratulations."

src: 陶业按：请允许我借此机会，对全美学自联（IFCSS）和明尼苏达中国民主基金会（MCDF）从事人道主义救助32年的历史作一个简单介绍。
tgt: Tao Yean: please allow me to take this opportunity to make a brief introduction to the 32-year history of humanitarian assistance of IFCSS and MCDF.
hypo: "Allow me to provide a brief introduction to the history of 32 years of humanitarian assistance by the Independent Federation of Chinese Students and Scholars (IFCSS) and the Minnesota China Democracy Fund (MCDF)."

src: 在从事人道主义救助的过程中，全美学自联与明尼苏达中国民主基金会是平行的两个组织，项目的执行者常有交叉。
tgt: In the process of humanitarian relief, IFCSS and MCDF are parallel organizations, and there are often intersections between the project executors.
hypo: During the process of engaging in humanitarian aid as a humanitarian organization, the United States and the Maldives China Democracy Fund are two parallel organizations, and the project executors often overlap.

src: （苹果日报图：天安門母親網站由陶業負責打理。）pic.twitter.com/UxID9ZGjzm
tgt: (Apple Daily photo: Tiananmen Mother website is managed by Tao Ye. ) pic.twitter.com/UxID9ZGjzm
hypo: The translation of the sentence is: "Apple Daily is responsible for managing the website of the mother of the Tiananmen."

src: 救助款常常不能顺利送达六四难属手中。
tgt: The relief funds often fail to reach the family of the victims of the June 4th Movement successfully.
hypo: The translation of the sentence "救助款常常不能顺利送达六四难属手中。" in English is: "Relief funds often cannot be delivered smoothly to the hands of the recipients."

src: 1994年，经丁老师建议，由“天安门母亲”成立专门小组，统筹和负责人道救助款的接收与分发。
tgt: In 1994, Ding advised that the “Tiananmen Mother” set up a special group to coordinate and take charge of the receipt and distribution of humanitarian relief funds.
hypo: In 1994, under the guidance of Ding Laoshi, a special group called "Tiananmen Mothers" was established to take charge of collecting and distributing donations for the rescue and relief efforts.

src: 1998年，MCDF设立《六四孤儿教育基金》，执行11年后，于2009年，在所有六四孤儿都大学毕业后，MCDF继而设立《六四孤苦老人特困户救助基金》，并一直执行至今。
tgt: In 1998, MCDF established the “June 4th Orphan Education Fund”; after 11 years of implementation, in 2009, after all the June 4th orphans graduated from University, MCDF then established the “June 4th Elderly with No Family Destitute Poverty Relief Fund”, which has been implemented until now.
