hypo: In 1998, MCDF established the "Six-Four Orphan Education Fund," which was executed 11 years later in 2009. After all Six-Four orphans had graduated from university, MCDF established the "Six-Four Orphan Poverty Assistance Fund" and has been executing it until today.

src: 这些项目的资金，主要来自六四当年的校园和社会捐款，来自个人的慷慨捐助，并受到兄弟大学民主基金会的支持。
tgt: The funds for these projects mainly came from campus and social donations of generous individual donations in the year of June 4th event, and were supported by the democracy foundation of brother universities.
hypo: The funding for these projects mainly comes from donations made during the June Fourth Movement and from social donations, as well as individual acts of kindness and the support of the Democracy Fund of XYZ University.

src: 自2018年起，还得到了劳改研究基金会的支持。
tgt: Since 2018, it has also been supported by the Reform through Labor Research Foundation.
hypo: "Since 2018, it has received support from the Labor Research Institute."

src: 直到去年，时隔31年后，六四难属们终于收到了一笔来自香港的当年以六四的名义募捐来的部分捐款。
tgt: Last year, after 31 years, the family of the victims of the June 4th Movement finally received a part of the donation made by Hong Kong in the name of the June 4th Movement.
hypo: Last year, it took 31 years for the victims of the June 4th incident to finally receive a portion of the donations that were made in the name of June 4th by people in Hong Kong.

src: 在此期间，《中国人权》也在独立地执行它们的人道救助项目。
tgt: During this period, China Human Rights is also independently implementing their humanitarian relief project.
hypo: During this period, "China Human Rights" was also carrying out its independent humanitarian relief projects. Ensure the following words are included: humanitarian relief.

src: 我们理解，丁老师叫停六四捐助，是为捐款人考虑，我们也确实都是一些退休老人，收入并非如退休前充裕，特此对丁老师的“致友人”一信表示感谢。
tgt: We understand that Ding called a stop to the June 4th donation for the consideration of the donors; we are indeed retired elderly, and our income is not as much as before; we hereby thank teacher Ding for his “Letter to Friends”.
hypo: "We understand that Ding Laoshi called for a stop to the donations, it is for the consideration of the donors, and we are indeed a group of retirees, our income is not as comfortable as before, especially for Ding Laoshi's "letter of thanks to friends" to express our gratitude."

src: 我们会尊重难属们的决定，在两年内终止这一项目，并在需要时，立即恢复。
tgt: We will respect the decision of the family of the victims and terminate this project within two years and resume it immediately when necessary.
hypo: We will respect the difficult decision of terminating this project within two years and restore it as needed.

src: 对于那些多年来一直坚持慷慨解囊，冒着风险递送人道救助款的那些侠肝义胆的同道们，一并表示感谢和敬意。
tgt: I would like to express my gratitude and respect to those chivalrous fellows who have been giving generously and taking risks to deliver humanitarian relief funds for many years.
hypo: For those who have consistently upheld the spirit of generosity, braving risks to deliver aid to those in need, I offer my deepest gratitude and respect.

src: 一个想分享个人经历的编程小白。
tgt: I am a programming newbie and I want to share my experience.
hypo: "A programming newbie who wants to share personal experiences."

src: 如果是打算在这一行业入行倒是可以选择去找一个地方进行培训，但如果没这方面的想法的话，最好还是自学的好，毕竟培训要花的钱是非常多的，而且还要用6个月的时间去学习。
tgt: If you want to enter this industry, you can choose to find a place to get some training , but if you don’t want to, it’s better to study on your own; after all, trainings are expensive and it will take you six months to learn it.
hypo: "If you are planning to enter this industry, it is possible to choose to find a place to receive training, but if you don't have that kind of idea, it's best to self-study. After all, training requires a lot of money and takes six months to learn."

src: 但如果是打算在这一行业入坑的话培训确实是非常不错的选择，尤其是那些自制力及其弱的人，培训更是非常好的选择。
tgt: However, if you want to enter this industry, then training is a great option, especially for those who are extremely not self-disciplined.
hypo: "But if you are planning to enter this industry, training is indeed a very good choice, especially for those who lack self-discipline."

src: 要是自身自制力比较强的话也可以选择自学，只不过会比较累。
tgt: You can choose to teach yourself if you are self-disciplined, but it will be tiring.
hypo: "If you have a strong self-study ability, you can choose to self-study, but it may be more tiring."

src: 当然选择一个好的培训机构是非常重要的事情。
tgt: Certainly, selecting a good training agency is very important.
hypo: Of course, choosing a good training agency is a very important matter.

src: 首先要看这个机构的师资力量，如果师资力量不够强大的话，这个培训机构就没有什么意义了，当然一些新开的培训机构师资力量都不是特别强。
tgt: You need to first look at the faculty of this agency; if it’s not strong enough, you can cross that agency off your list; of course, some new agencies don’t have strong faculties.
hypo: First, we need to assess the strength of this agency's human resources. If the human resources are not strong enough, then this training agency has no meaning. Of course, some newly established training agencies may not have particularly strong human resources.

src: 其次在选择之前打探一下这个培训机构，最好可以打探一下这个机构出来的学生，毕竟只有机构的学生才知道这个机构到底怎么样，讲解的课程是好或者不好。
tgt: Secondly, you shall do some research on the agency before choosing it; it’s best to contact former students of the agency; after all, only students know how the agency really is and whether the curriculum is good or not.
hypo: "Before choosing, investigate this training organization. It's best to investigate the students of this organization, after all, only the students of the organization know if it's good or not, and what they teach."

src: 你好，其实你这个问题问的我也不知道怎么回答，因为对于你自身的情况并没有做一定的介绍，而学习这个东西和个人自身的情况有很大的关系的。
tgt: Hello, actually I’m not sure how to answer your question since you didn’t introduce your own situation, and learning this is closely related to your situation.
hypo: "Hello, to be honest, I'm not sure how to answer your question because I haven't introduced my situation to you, and there is a direct relationship between learning this and your personal situation."

src: 比如专业、年龄、想学习的语言，甚至在哪个城市，这些都会和你学习或者想要从事的行业有关系的。
tgt: Such as your major, age, the language you want to learn, and even which city you are in; all of these are related to what you want to learn or what industry you want to go into.
hypo: Here's a possible translation of the sentence into English:  "For example, factors such as profession, age, and the language you want to learn, even the city where you want to learn it, are all related to the industry you want to work in or the career you want to pursue."

src: 如果你是学生的话并且还没有毕业，或者是计算机专业的已经毕业的，那么如果时间充足我个人建议自学，这个是效率和成本最低的，现在很多的线下线上的培训机构其实也很不错，但是一学习成本高，二投入的时间比较多，基本需要集中培训3-6个月。
tgt: If you are a student who haven’t graduated yet, or if you are a computer major and have graduated, then I recommend learning it yourself if you have time, and this is the method with lowest efficiency and cost; many offline and online training agencies are good now, but it comes with great cost and takes a lot of time; it basically needs a concentrated training of three to six months.
hypo: If you are a student who has not yet graduated, or if you are a computer science graduate, I recommend self-study if you have enough time. This is the most cost-effective and time-efficient option, and there are many online and offline training institutions that are not bad. However, the cost of learning is high, and the time investment is relatively large. Basically, you need to concentrate on training for 3-6 months.

src: 但是如果是我说的这些情况的话，自学就很方便，现在网络上的很多学习资源都是免费的，或者去b站也有很多的培训资源，如果你不会找资源，你也可以通过简介联系到我，获取免费的资源，或者详细的咨询也行。
tgt: However, if you are in the same situation as I mentioned, it is convenient to learn it yourself; many learning resources are free online, or you can gain access to a lot of training resources on Bilibili; if you don’t know how to search for them, you can contact me according to my bio and get free resources or detailed consultation.
hypo: However, if I were to say the same things, self-study would be very convenient. Nowadays, there are many online learning resources that are free, or you can find many training resources at B stations. If you don't look for resources, you can also get in touch with me for free resources or detailed consultation.

src: 另外还有一些比较经典的书籍可以结合视频综合学习。
tgt: There are also classic books to supplement your study with videos.
hypo: "In addition, there are some more classic books that can be combined with video learning."

src: 如果你不是计算机专业的，但是也能够支付一定的学习金钱和时间成本，那么建议去培训机构学习，这样学习不用很费劲，老师讲解的也很详细，有问题也有人专门解答，另外在学习规划或者监督方面也有帮助。
tgt: If you are not a computer major, but you can pay certain amount of money and devote your time to your learning, then I suggest you go to an agency to study; it’ll be easier this way as the teachers will explain in detail and there will be designated people answering your questions; in addition, it’ll be helpful to your study planning or help you get supervision.
hypo: If you are not a computer science major but are willing to invest in learning costs and time, I suggest you consider attending a training institution. Learning there is not very expensive, and the teachers' explanations are very detailed. If you have any questions, there are people who specialize in answering them. Additionally, there is help in planning or supervision.

src: 而且现在很多的培训机构都会签就业协议，有内推名额，学习之后推荐去公司，这样后面找工作的面试环节也能够省不少事情。
tgt: Further, many training agencies will sign employment agreement; they have quota for internal promotion, and you can be recommended to a company after your learning, so that the job interview process can be easier.
hypo: "Moreover, many training institutions now sign employment contracts with companies, specifying a quota for internal promotions. After completing their training, they are recommended to go to the company, which can save them a lot of trouble in finding a job."

src: 以上就是我的一些看法，前面说的因为不了解你的情况，所以只大概介绍也并不详细，如果你有其他的想咨询的，可以随时联系我进行交流沟通。
tgt: The above is my opinion; as I said, I don’t know about your situation so my introduction is not detailed; if you want to consult other things, you may contact me any time.
hypo: Here's the English translation of the sentence:  "The above are my opinions, and I said it because I don't know your situation, so I only gave a rough introduction. If you have other things you want to consult about, you can contact me anytime for communication and discussion."  And here's a breakdown of the translation:  * "The above are my opinions" - 这些都是我的看法。 * "and I said it" - 我说了。 * "because I don't know your situation" - 因为我不知道你的情况。 * "so I only gave a rough introduction" -

src: 本人，承接各种（安装、清洗，维修）、壁挂炉热水器，净水器，洗衣机、空调、马桶、灶头、油烟机、装灯具、擦玻璃，专业美缝，家政服务
tgt: I undertake all kinds of housekeeping services including installation, cleaning, and maintenance of wall mounted water heater, water purifier, washing machine, air conditioner, toilet, stove, range hood, lamp installation, glass cleaning, and professional sewing.
hypo: "Kinds" 的英文翻译是 "types"。  "Glass" 的英文翻译是 "glass"。  "Cleaning" 的英文翻译是 "cleaning"。

src: 感谢那些默默给我点赞的人 ，为了生活努力拼搏 生活很累但要继续
tgt: Thanks to everyone who liked my post; I will carry on working hard although life is difficult.
hypo: "Thank you to those who gave me a silent thumbs up. Although life is tiring, I must continue to strive for it."

src: 生活不会辜负每一个努力的人 ，喜欢就关注我吧 ，感谢那些默默给我点赞的人
tgt: Life will not let hardworking people down; follow me if you like me; thank you to everyone who have liked my post.
hypo: "Letting hardworking people down" 的英文翻译是 "letting down hardworking people"。

src: 生活就是这样，别人只看结果，自己独撑过程，面对生活，我们除了坚强，就是继续，别无选择，路可以回头看但不能回头走……
tgt: This is life; others only see the result and you must go through it alone; in the face of life, we can only stay strong and carry on; there is no other choice; you can look back on life, but you cannot relive it...
hypo: "Life is like this. Others only see the results, but we have to go through the process of standing alone. Facing life, we have to be strong, but we have no choice. We can look back, but we can't go back."

src: 保洁是工作，也是职责，生活因服务而美丽，服务因用心而精彩。
tgt: Cleaning is a job and a responsibility; life is more beautiful with services, and services are wonderful because we work hard.
hypo: "Cleaning is work, it is also a responsibility. Life is beautiful due to service, and service is outstanding due to a heart of dedication."

src: 保洁我们虽然做的是最脏的活，但我们会用最认真的态度把客户家每个角落打扫的干干净净，看到客户满意的笑容和竖起的大拇指，那一刻所有的累都值了，付出终有回报！
tgt: Although we do the most dirty work in cleaning, we will try to clean all the corners of the client’s house with our hard work; the moment I see the client’s smile and big thumb up, all the efforts spent are worthwhile; your hard work will pay off!
hypo: Although we may have done the dirtiest job, we will use our most meticulous attitude to clean every corner of the customer's home, and see the satisfied smile and raised finger of the customer. At that moment, all the hard work will be worth it, and the final reward will be obtained!

src: 我的日常工作
tgt: My daily work
hypo: "My daily work ensures that it includes these words."

src: ——您的要求，我的服务。
tgt: - your requirements, my service.
hypo: "Your requirements are my service."

src: 用心服务，用心清洁，留住美好。
tgt: Keep the beauty with attentive service and cleaning.
hypo: "Provide attentive service, attentive cleaning, and leave behind a beautiful environment."

src: 您关心的细节，丰桂家政帮你做到了“净”我所能，服务爱家。
tgt: Feng Gui Housekeeping will try our best to care for the details you care about and love your house with our services.
hypo: The English translation of the sentence is:  "Your concern for the details has enabled our services to provide a "clean" and "loving" care for you, dear family."  Here is a breakdown of the translation:  * "Your concern for the details": refers to the fact that the person being addressed is paying attention to the small details. * "has enabled our services": indicates that the person's concern for details has led to a certain outcome, in this case the provision of "clean" and "loving" care. * "to provide a "clean" and "loving" care for you, dear family": means that the services are able to offer a clean and lov

src: 保万家洁净，树家政囗碑，服务到位，洁净到家。
tgt: Keep thousands of houses clean, establish a brand of housekeeping; standard service, in-house cleaning.
hypo: "Establish a clean and tidy in-house environment, keep thousands of households clean, provide quality service, and maintain a clean and tidy home."

src: 室内外保洁 ，我的日常工作
tgt: Indoor and outdoor cleaning, my daily work
hypo: "Daily cleaning inside and outside the room is part of my daily work."

src: 水晶灯虽然华丽，但长时间不清洗也会黯淡无光，只有清洗后才可以溢放光彩，人生亦是如此
tgt: Although the crystal lamp looks luxurious, it will be dim if it has not cleaned for a long time; only after cleaning, can it shine brightly, and so is life.
hypo: Although a diamond is beautiful, it loses its luster over time if not cleaned regularly. Only after being cleaned can it shine brightly again. Similarly, life is like a diamond that requires regular maintenance to shine brightly.

src: 用心去做方能成功，用细致去塑造精致，美缝我们是认真的。
tgt: Do it with heart and we can succeed; we are serious about creating exquisite things with our attention to details, and we are serious about cleaning seams.
hypo: "With care and attention, even the most mundane tasks can become exquisite. We take our work seriously and strive for excellence in every detail."

src: 给我机会，一定会让你满意的，质量说明一切，因为专业值得被信赖，你的认可是我最鼓励！
tgt: Give me a chance and you will be satisfied; quality is everything, because professionalism is worth trusting; your recognition is the best encouragement to me!
hypo: "Give me the opportunity, and I will definitely make you satisfied, quality is everything, because professionalism is worth being trusted, your recognition is my biggest encouragement!"

src: 当下的各行各业都不好干啊！
tgt: At present, there is not one industry that is easy to do!
hypo: Easy come, easy go.

src: 但是我始终相信，只要认真态度，够坚持，够努力，我就会比别人好一点，至少总比坐着抱怨强吧”！
tgt: But I always believe that as long as I am serious, persistent and hard-working, I will be slightly better than others; it’s at least better than sitting around and complaining!”
hypo: "But I always believe that as long as you have a serious attitude and can persevere and work hard, you will be better than others, at least stronger than those who always complain."

src: 一天之计在于晨，所有的美好从清晨开始 希望你携带着快乐、幸运、健康、如意出发 开始新的一天，保持一整天的好心情 早安
tgt: Morning is the most important time of the day; all the good things begin in the morning; I hope you can start a new day with happiness, luck, health and joy; keep a good mood all day long; good morning.
hypo: "Morning is the best part of the day, for it is in the morning that all good things begin. Hope you carry happiness, luck, health, and contentment with you as you start a new day. Stay cheerful throughout the day."

src: 小时候，幸福是一件东西，拥有就幸福； 长大后，幸福是一个目标，达到就幸福； 成熟后发现，幸福原来是一种心态，领悟就幸福。
tgt: When we were children, happiness was a thing, and we were happy when we had it; when we grow up, happiness is a goal, and we will be happy when we reach it; after maturity, I found that happiness is actually a state of mind, and understanding is happiness.
hypo: When I was young, happiness was a thing, having it made me happy; when I grew up, happiness became a goal, achieving it made me happy; when I became mature, I realized that happiness was a state of mind, understanding it brought me happiness.

src: 做最真实最善良的自己，依心而行，无憾今生；人生一条路，走自己的路；人生两件宝：身体好、心情好，漂漂亮亮活到老！
tgt: Be the truest and kindest self, act according to your heart, and leave no regrets in your life; life is a road, go your own way; there are two treasures in life: good health and good mood, and you will live a beautiful life!
hypo: "Do your best to be honest and kind to yourself, and follow your heart. Regret nothing in life. Your life is a journey, and you should walk your own path. The two treasures of life are a healthy body and a good mood. Enjoy life to the fullest!"

src: 人生的每个阶段，都会遇到不同的难题。
tgt: We will encounter different difficulties in different stages of life.
hypo: "At each stage of life, we will encounter different difficulties."

src: 很多时候，束缚住你的并不是能力，而是积极面对的勇气。
tgt: Often times, what is restraining you is not you ability but your courage to face it actively.
hypo: "Very often, the thing that holds you back is not your ability, but your courage to face it."

src: 既然无法躲避，不如坦然面对。
tgt: Since you cannot hide, you’d rather face it.
hypo: "Since it is impossible to avoid, it is better to face it head-on."

src: 你越害怕，越会被困难击倒；你若迎难而上，问题终会迎刃而解。
tgt: The more scared you are, the easier you will be knocked down by difficulties; if you take it head on, the problem will be solved.
hypo: The English translation of the sentence is: "The more afraid you are, the more likely you are to be overwhelmed by difficulties; but if you face challenges head-on, problems will eventually be resolved."  Here's a version that includes the phrase "knocked down":  "The more afraid you are, the more likely you are to be knocked down by difficulties; but if you face challenges head-on, problems will eventually be knocked down."

src: 二、虽然右派在历史上有得志时代，但不长，所以短是因为给点儿阳光就灿烂，喝点儿开水就出汗；稍得志便得陇望蜀，遭打击便毛将焉附。
tgt: 2. Although the Rightists had their time in history, it was not long, and the reason why it was short was they were over their head once they got a tiny bit of sweetness; a little success will lead to insatiable desires, and just one blow and they will lose their ground to exist.
hypo: Although the right-wingers have had their moments in history, they don't last long. It's because they're so arrogant that they're scorched by a single ray of sunlight and start sweating as soon as they take a sip of water. If they're a bit more humble, they'll be able to see further and won't be so easily defeated by a few blows.

src: 但实事求是来说，右派在社会进步过程中起到过积极作用。
tgt: But to speak the truth, the Rightists have once played a positive role in the process of social progress.
hypo: "But in reality, the rightists have played a positive role in the progress of society."

src: 从结束文革定义真理标准，发展经济提高科技以及促进行政制度化和人权保障等方面，右派的积极意义不该否定。
tgt: The positive significance of the Rightists should not be denied in terms of ending the cultural revolution, defining the standard of truth, developing the economy, improving science and technology, and promoting the institutionalization of administration and the protection of human rights.
hypo: "Developing the economy, improving science and technology, and promoting political system reform and human rights protection, the positive significance of the right-wing should not be denied."

src: 三、就我而言，尽管不完全同意李伟东的有些说法，但我很在意他的说法，也很尊重李伟东这个人；因为他是认真的，他对中国是认真的，对中国的社会问题也是认真看待的。
tgt: 3. For me, although I don’t fully agree with some of Li Weidong’s statements, I really care about his statements and respect Li Weidong; Because he is conscientious, he is serious about China, and he also takes China’s social problems seriously.
hypo: Here's the English translation of the sentence:  "As far as I'm concerned, although I don't fully agree with Li Wen's views, I'm interested in his views and respect Li Wen as a person. This is because he is diligent and pays attention to China, and also takes a serious view of China's social problems."

src: 但我反对他的反共理论，我认为反必要革命，革命则必然导致社会动荡，民生受损，政治团体鱼龙混杂泥沙俱下，再就是外国趁虚而入。
tgt: But I oppose his anti-communist theory; I believe that unnecessary revolution should be opposed to; revolution will inevitably lead to social unrest and damage to people’s livelihood; political groups will be mixed, and foreign countries will avail themselves of the opportunity to get in.
hypo: "But I oppose his anti-communist theory, I believe that revolution is necessary, revolution will inevitably lead to social turmoil, people's lives will be affected, political parties will be in disorder, and foreigners will take advantage of the chaos to interfere."

src: 四、改变或改善中国要有耐心和为国为民负责的态度，政治投机企图火中取栗者，那不是右派，是混蛋。
tgt: 4. Changing or improving China requires patience and the attitude to be responsible for the country and the people; those who try to make money from political opportunities are not Rightists, but bastards.
hypo: Here's the English translation of the sentence:  "Fourthly, changing or improving China requires patience and a sense of responsibility for the country and the people, not just for political opportunism. Those who engage in political speculation without taking responsibility for their actions are not Rightists, but scoundrels."

src: 再聊聊左。
tgt: Let’s talk about Leftists.
hypo: "Let's talk more."

src: 左，其实是一帮时代和政治的弃儿。
tgt: Leftists, in fact, are a group of outcasts of the times and politics.
hypo: "Leftists, in fact, are the discarded offspring of time and politics."

src: 如果说右具有对社会的积极意义，共产党还会在需要的时候听取一些右的言论和分析他们的思想，那么左就没这造化了，因为左所要的正是共产党所扔掉的糟粕！
tgt: If the Rightists are of positive significance to society, and the Communist Party will listen to some of the Rightists’ remarks and analyze their thoughts when necessary, the Leftists don’t have such luck, because what the Leftists want is the dross thrown away by the Communist Party!
hypo: "If it is said that the Right has a positive significance in society, the Communist Party will still listen to some of the Right's opinions and analyze their thoughts when necessary. However, the Left cannot do this because the Left only wants what the Communist Party has discarded!"

src: 五、最近看到一些朋友边怼反贼边驳左癫，还挺动真气，我觉得大可不必。
tgt: 5. Recently, I saw some friends refuting the rebels and crazy Leftists at the same time, and they got really angry; I don't think it’s necessary at all.
hypo: "Recently, I saw some friends who were either refuting or criticizing others, and they were quite passionate about it. I don't think it's necessary to get involved."

src: 跟汉奸跟左癫都不要试图讲理，都是一根儿筋，无理可讲。
tgt: Don’t try to reason with rebels and crazy Leftists; they are all one track minded and unreasonable.
hypo: "Do not try to reason with rebels or the insane, for they are both as stubborn as a mule."

src: 也不要试图证明咱们是正确的，更不要想着让反贼和左癫承认，何必呢？
tgt: Don’t try to prove we are right, and don’t even think about asking rebels and crazy Leftists to admit it; why bother?
hypo: "Do not try to prove that we are right, and do not even think about trying to make rebels and left-wingers acknowledge it. Why bother?"

src: 我这样告诉朋友们：当反贼骂你五毛，当左癫骂你右狗的时候，恰恰证明我们的这条中间道路是正确的！
tgt: I told my friends: when the rebels call you a fifty-cent and when the leftist call you a rightist dog, they prove we are on the correct track in the middle!
hypo: Here's the English translation of the sentence:  "I tell my friends this: when rebels call us five-cent rebels, and when leftists call us rightists' dogs, we can just about prove that we are on the right track!"

src: 许多人少年时候也有理想，老了之后，却忘了理想，或追求理想，却沦为偏执。
tgt: Many people had dreams when they were young, but they forgot about them when they got older; or, they pursue their dreams and become paranoid.
hypo: "Many people in their youth also have ideals, but as they grow older, they may forget or pursue their ideals, only to become misguided or paranoid."

src: 和理想渐行渐远，甚至屠龙少年终成恶龙。
tgt: They drift apart from their dreams and the young Dragon Slayer will eventually become a vicious dragon.
hypo: "With ideals gradually drifting away, even a young dragon may eventually become an evil dragon."

src: 左右我觉得一般是指约束和自由，中国从历史文化的先天基因导致中国整体应该是偏左。
tgt: I think left and right generally refers to restraint and freedom; the innate genes of China’s history and culture make China overall relatively left.
hypo: "Overall, referring to China, I think 'left' and 'right' generally refer to constraints and freedom. Given China's historical and cultural roots, the overall orientation of China should be to the left."

src: 而国内右派自由，注重效率和发展，左派加强监管，更注重公平以及安全。
tgt: The domestic Rightists are free and stress efficiency and development, while the Leftists strengthen supervision and pay more attention to fairness and safety.
hypo: Domestic Rightists prioritize efficiency and development, while Leftists emphasize monitoring and fairness.

src: 现在社会总体希望更注重公平，同时中美相争，偏左是肯定的，估计还得持续很多年。
tgt: At present, society overall hopes to pay more attention to justice; at the same time, it is certain that when China and the United States fight, it is bound to lean towards left, which is estimated to continue for many years.
hypo: "Currently, society as a whole is placing a greater emphasis on fairness, while tensions between China and the US continue to escalate. It is widely expected that the trend of left-leaning policies will continue for many years to come."

src: 虽然看不懂，点赞就完事儿啦
tgt: Just like it if you don’t understand.
hypo: "Although I don't understand, just give me a thumbs up and we're done with it."

src: 啥也不说了，花花就是这么仗义
tgt: No need to say more, Huahua is generous.
hypo: "What's the point of talking, Huahua is already like this."

src: 近两年，美帝对华为芯片的封锁和围堵，不仅让华为陷入前所未有的困境，也让“美系”企业遭遇巨大的损失。
tgt: In the past two years, the blockade and interception of the US on Huawei chips not only made Huawei fall into an unprecedented difficult position but also made “American” enterprises suffer from huge losses.
hypo: "In the past two years, the US ban on Huawei chips has not only caused Huawei to face unprecedented difficulties, but also led to huge losses for American enterprises."

src: 美帝打压中国芯片产业，要求自家企业及盟友国相关企业同时对我国芯片产业进行封锁，直接导致的后果就是全球芯片供应商的订单和利润受到影响，造成芯片生产企业的研发投入降低、产能下降，从而造成了全球范围内芯片供应链的短缺的紊乱。
tgt: The US suppresses China’s chips industry and required its own enterprises and relevant enterprises of its allies to block China’s chip industry at the same time; the direct consequence was that the number of orders and profits of global chip suppliers were affected, resulting in the decrease in the investment of research and development and production capacity of chip manufacturers, which further led to the disorder of chip supply chain shortages on a global scale.
hypo: "Provide an English translation of the following sentence: '美帝打压中国芯片产业，要求自家企业及盟友国相关企业同时对我国芯片产业进行封锁，直接导致的后果就是全球芯片供应商的订单和利润受到影响，造成芯片生产企业的研发投入降低、产能下降，

src: 如今“缺芯”已经波及到了全球各大行业，比如车企停产、手机涨价，几乎所有用到芯片的行业都深受其害。
tgt: Today, “lack of chips” has affected all major industries of the world, resulting in the suspension of production of car enterprises and rise in prices of mobile phones; almost all the industries using chips are greatly impacted.
hypo: "Shortage" has affected industries worldwide, such as the automotive industry's production suspension and the increase in phone prices. Almost all industries that use chips are affected by it.

src: 为了掌握“芯片”自主权，越来越多国家的科技巨头开始走向“去美化”的道路。
tgt: To gain the right to make their own decisions on “chips”, more and more countries’ tech giants are taking the path of “de-Americanized”.
hypo: "To gain control over "chips," many tech giants in various countries are moving towards a "de-Americanized" path. Ensure the following words are included: decisions, chips, de-Americanized."

src: 为了牢牢把控全球半导体控制权，牵制中国半导体行业的发展，最近老美动作频频，又是主持“芯片峰会”；又是邀请64国巨头成立半导体联盟，并拔款扶持美国本土科技巨头，比如，美帝老牌科技巨头英特尔为了夺回在芯片领域的主导地位，斥资200亿美元在美国亚利桑那州建2座晶圆加工厂，并对外开放芯片代工业务。
tgt: In order to firmly holding the right to control global semiconductor in its hands and pin down the development of China’s semiconductor industry, the United States have made frequent moves recently such as hosting the “chip summit”, inviting the giants of 64 countries to establish a semiconductor alliance and allocating funds to support the local technology giants in the United States; in order to regain its leading position in the chip industry, Intel, an old technology giant in the United States, spent $ 20 billion to build two wafer processing plants in Arizona, US and opened its chip OEM business.
hypo: To tightly control global semiconductor power, grasp the development of China's semiconductor industry, recently, the United States has frequently taken actions, and hosted the "Chip Summit"; also invited 64 countries' giants to establish a semiconductor alliance, and borrowed money to support domestic technology giants, such as, Intel, the old brand of the technology giant, spent 200 billion US dollars to build a second diamond wafer factory in the United States' Silicon Valley, and opened up its semiconductor foundry business to the outside.

src: 当大多数人都以为，英特尔此番举动将对台积电造成一定冲击，并很有可能抢走台积电的“饭碗”。
tgt: When most people think Intel’s move will make certain impact on Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company and even steal their job.
hypo: Most people believe that Intel's latest move will have a certain impact on Taiwan's electronics industry and may even snatch away Taiwan's "rice bowl."

src: 之所以这么肯定，是因为，英特尔作为美帝老牌科技巨头，在半导体领域深耕几十年，拥有大量的人才队伍和技术储备，必定能在短期内迅速崛起，打败台积电。
tgt: They are sure about it because Intel, as an old tech giant in the US, worked diligently in the semiconductor industry for dozens of years and have a large amount of talent teams and technological reserve; it is bound to rise within a short time and defeat Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company.
hypo: The reason why this is so confident is because Intel, as a leading technology giant of the American Empire, has been deeply cultivating in the semiconductor industry for several decades and has a large team of talents and technology reserves, which must be able to rapidly rise and defeat TSMC in a short period of time.

src: 然而，对于英特尔的这个决定，台积电创始人张忠谋却不屑一顾。
tgt: However, Zhang Zhongmou, founder of Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company, sniffed at the decision of Intel.
hypo: However, Edison's decision did not faze Tesla, the founder of Taiyuan Electric.

src: 在今年四月举行的“2021大师智库论坛”上，张忠谋语出惊人，对于英特尔斥资建晶圆厂这个举动，张忠谋毫无顾忌直言：英特尔建芯片代工厂，相当讽刺。
tgt: At the “2021 Master Think Tank Forum” held in April this year, Zhang Zhongmou made a surprising remark and spoke bluntly about Intel’s move to build a wafer factory, “it is rather ironic for Intel to build an OEM factory of chips”.
hypo: During the "2021 Mastermind Summit" held in April, Zhang Zhihuan made a surprising statement, expressing his views on Intel's plan to invest in building a wafer fab: Zhang Zhihuan said without hesitation that building a wafer fab is equivalent to ridiculing Intel.  Here's the translation:  During the "2021 Mastermind Summit" held in April, Zhang Zhihuan made a surprising statement, expressing his views on Intel's plan to invest in building a wafer fab: Zhang Zhihuan said without hesitation that building a wafer fab is equivalent to ridiculing Intel.

src: 张忠谋之所以对英特尔进军晶圆领域颇为不屑，是因为张忠谋对30多年前台积电与英特尔的一段恩怨依然耿耿于怀。
tgt: Zhang Zhongmou disdained Intel’s decision to get into the wafer industry because Zhang Zhong still holds a grudge against a feud between Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company and Intel more than 30 years.
hypo: The reason why Zhang Zhihuan is not enthusiastic about Intel entering the wafer industry is because he still harbors a grudge against Intel for something that happened more than 30 years ago.

src: 上世纪六七十年代，英特尔一直是美帝制造业中的明珠，雄居全球巅峰的位置，是世界半导体领域的霸主。
tgt: In the 1960s and 1970s, Intel has been the pearl in the manufacturing industry of the United States, occupying the leading position in the world; it was a king in the semiconductor industry in the world.
hypo: In the late 1960s and early 1970s, Intel was a shining star in the American manufacturing industry, occupying a leading position globally and dominating the world's semi-conductor market.

src: 到上世纪80年代，世界半导体高端芯片一直被少数强者掌握。
tgt: Until the 1980s, the world's high-end semiconductor chips have been controlled by a few strong ones.
hypo: "Until the 1980s, high-end semiconductors were monopolized by a small number of strong players."

src: 当时半导体行业以IDM模式为特征，芯片从设计、制造到封测都是由一家工厂来完成，英特尔就是那个时代的代表。
tgt: At that time, the semiconductor industry was characterized by IDM mode; chips were designed, manufactured and sealed by the same factory, and Intel was a representative of that era.
hypo: "At that time, the semiconductor industry characterized by IDM mode, where the chip design, manufacturing, and testing were all done by a single factory, and Intel was the representative of that era."

src: 然而这样的模式让一些小企业不堪重负，很多半导体创业者面对巨额的产线建设费用只能望而却步。
tgt: However, such a model has overwhelmed some small enterprises, and many semiconductor entrepreneurs could only flinch in the face of huge production line construction costs.
hypo: However, such a model makes it difficult for some small businesses to keep up with the burden of debt, and many semiconductor entrepreneurs face huge construction costs for their production lines but can only dream about it.

src: 在市场需求的感召下，进入80年代后，芯片行业开始出现分工合作的现象，1984年张忠谋听说有专门做芯片设计的公司，便认为既然有专门做设计的，那么就可以成立一家专门用于晶圆制造的工厂。
tgt: To respond to the calling of market demand, after entering the 1980s, the phenomenon of division of labor and cooperation of chips industry began to appear; in 1984, Zhang Zhongmou heard that there were companies specializing in chip design, so he thought that since there were companies specializing in design, a factory specializing in wafer manufacturing could be established.
hypo: "In response to the call of the market, after the 1980s, the semiconductor industry began to exhibit a trend of cooperative division of labor, in 1984, Zhang Zhihuan heard that there was a company specializing in semiconductor design, and he believed that since there was a specialized company for design, then a factory specializing in wafer production could be established."

src: 不久之后，张忠谋的设想变成了现实，台积电应运而生。
tgt: Soon after, Zhang Zhongmou’s imagination became reality, and Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company was created.
hypo: "不久之后，张忠谋的想象变成了现实，台积电应运而生。确保包含这些词：imagination became."

src: 台积电把主营业务瞄准了“晶圆加工”这个单一环节，不进行设计，只提供晶圆制造的代工服务。
tgt: Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company aimed to set the single link of “processing of wafers” as its primary business; without design, only OEM services of wafer manufacturing was provided.
hypo: "Taiwan Semiconductor has targeted the 'wafer manufacturing' single link, and does not provide design services, only offering wafer fabrication as a contract service."

src: 当时刚创立的台积电，在英特尔这个巨无霸面前就是小喽啰。
tgt: The newly established Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company was only a small player in front of Intel the giant.
hypo: At the time when the newly established Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company (TSMC) was still small and insignificant, it was just a tiny ant in front of the giant Intel.

src: 为了获取资本支持，张忠谋就曾找英特尔投资，但当时英特尔一听说台积电只做芯片行业的制造环节，显然有些自视甚高，看不起台积电，果断拒绝对台积电进行投资。
tgt: In order to gain capital support, Zhang Zhongmou once approached Intel for investment, but Intel was arrogant when it heard Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company only participated in the manufacturing of the chips industry; Intel looked down on Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company and resolutely refused to invest in it.
hypo: To obtain capital support, Zhang Zhi even tried to seek investment from Intel, but when Intel heard that Tsinghua was only involved in the manufacturing of chips, they seemed to have a high opinion of themselves and refused to invest in Tsinghua.

src: 张忠谋也认定英特尔当时是看不起晶圆制程服务的。
tgt: Zhang Zhongmou also believed that Intel despised wafer manufacturing services at that time.
hypo: "张忠谋也认定英特尔当时是看不起晶圆制程服务的。确保包含这些词：that Intel, also believed, services at."

src: 没想到当年看不起晶圆制造服务的巨头，如今却也要开始做晶圆代工。
tgt: Unexpectedly, the giant that looked down on wafer manufacturing services back in the days will also start to do wafer foundry now.
hypo: "Never thought about it when I was young, but now I have to start making wafers."

src: 所以，张忠谋觉得英特尔进入晶圆代工很讽刺。
tgt: Therefore, Zhang Zhongmou thinks it is ironic for Intel to work on wafer foundry.
hypo: Here's the English translation of the sentence:  "So, Zhang Zhongyuan feels that Intel's entry into the diamond industry is very hurtful."  And here's a version that includes the word "to work":  "So, Zhang Zhongyuan feels that Intel working in the diamond industry is very hurtful."

src: 如今台积电的市值已经超过了英特尔。
tgt: The market value of Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company has surpassed that of Intel.
hypo: "Today, TSMC's market value has already exceeded Intel."

src: 面对台积电的强势进攻，英特尔自然也是不敢固步自封。
tgt: Facing the powerful attack of Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company, Intel naturally dares not to stand still.
hypo: "Intel naturally cannot stand still in the face of Tsinghua's strong attack."

src: 如今，台积电已经向着3nm芯片冲刺，而英特尔仍然停留在7年前的14nm。
tgt: Now, Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company is trying to develop to the 3nm chips, and Intel still stays at the 14nm 7 years ago.
hypo: "Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company (TSMC) has already pushed towards 3nm chips, while Intel is still stuck at 14nm from 7 years ago."

src: 想要赶超其实并非易事。
tgt: It is actually not difficulty to surpass it.
hypo: "It is not easy to surpass reality."

src: 今天来看一些【奇怪的热搜】。
tgt: Let’s see some “strange trending topics” today.
hypo: "Let's look at some strange search trends today."

src: 什么是正常的舆情？
tgt: What is normal public opinion?
hypo: What is normal public opinion?

src: 随机挑选三个热搜：二月二龙抬头、好丽友涨价、货拉拉事件，舆情扩散形成波峰，然后【指数下降】（平滑曲线）最终消散，如果产生次生舆情会有小驼峰再次出现。
tgt: Select three trending topics randomly, the rise of the head of the dragon on the 2nd of February, the price rise of ORLON, and the Huolala incident; the public opinion spread to form a peak, and then the [index declined] to form a (smooth curve) until it finally dissipated; if a secondary public opinion occurs, there will be a small hump again.
hypo: Provide the English translation for the following sentence: "Randomly select three hot search terms: February Two Dragons Raising Heads, Good-looking Friends Rising Prices, and Car Incident, popular sentiment spreads to form a peak, and then [index downward] (smooth curve) eventually dissipates, if there is a second wave of popular sentiment, there will be a small peak again."  Here is the English translation:  "Randomly select three trending search terms: February Two Dragons Raising Heads, Good-looking Friends Rising Prices, and Car Incident, popular sentiment spreads to form a peak, and then [index downward] (

src: 它们看起来和网信办官网曾展示的【网络舆情演化模型】相差无二。
tgt: They look no different from the [evolution model of online public opinion] once displayed on the official website of Cyberspace Administration.
hypo: "They look nothing alike and are completely different from the 'network sentiment model' previously displayed by the Cyberspace Administration."

src: 什么是异常的舆情？
tgt: What is abnormal public opinion?
hypo: What is abnormal public opinion?

src: 随机挑选同一事件中的六个热搜，呈现出【孤峰状】、【锯齿状】、【断崖状】。
tgt: Randomly select three trending topics from the same event, there are [solitary peak], [zigzag] and [cliff].
hypo: Randomly select six hot topics related to the same event, and display them in the form of "【孤峰状】", "【锯齿状】", and "【断崖状】". Ensure the inclusion of these words: trending topics.

src: 【孤峰状】即人为加热，迅速冲榜热搜，引起大众关注；【锯齿状】即周期性加热，确保话题盘踞热搜榜单；【断崖状】即集体撤离，该热搜发挥完“功能”，接到新任务、冲向新战场。
tgt: [Solidary peak] means the topic is artificially heated, quickly rushing to the trending topics list and attracting public attention; [Zigzag] refers to periodic heating, ensuring that topic stays on the trending topics list; [Cliff] means collective evacuation; after the topic has played its “function”, they received a new task and rushed to a new battlefield.
hypo: 【孤峰状】即人为加热，迅速冲榜热搜，引起公众关注； 【锯齿状】即周期性加热，确保话题盘踞热搜榜单； 【断崖状】即集体撤离，该热搜发挥完“功能”，接到新任务，冲向新战场。 确保包含这些

src: 图9中，一个事件的热度波峰恰好是另一事件的波谷，时间分秒不差，必定是统一批水军接到任务，开启新一轮攻势。
tgt: In picture 9, the peak of the heat wave of one event happens to be the trough of another event, and the time is exactly the same; it must be because a unified batch of paid internet trolls have received the task and started a new round of offensive.
hypo: "In Fig. 9, the peak of an event's heat wave is almost exactly another event's valley, and the time difference is only a matter of seconds. It must be that a unified group of soldiers receives the task and launches a new offensive."

src: 黑公关的专业化可见一斑：几十个热搜同时上榜，哪些吸引目光、哪些负责科普、哪些引战造势、哪些转移视线、哪些影响认知、哪些误导判断、哪些煽动情感、哪些裹挟决策，黑产账号分批次、分节点精细化作战，几乎考虑到舆情传播扩散中的所有要素。
tgt: The professionalism of black public relations can be seen: dozens of trending topics are on the list at the same time, which attract attention, which are responsible for explanation, which lead to argument and accumulate momentum, which divert attention, which affect understanding, which mislead judgment, which incite emotion, which coerce decision-making; the black production accounts work in batches and conduct segmented operations in different batches and time nodes, taking into account almost all elements in the spread of public opinion.
hypo: The professionalization of black PR can be seen in a nutshell: dozens of hot searches at the same time, which topics attract attention, which are responsible for public relations, which are responsible for shaping the agenda, which are responsible for shifting the focus, which affect cognition, which lead to incorrect judgments, which incite emotions, which constrain decision-making, and which account for almost all elements in the diffusion of social sentiment.  Inciting emotions, public relations, and trending topics are all included in this sentence.

src: 传播是一门科学，抛开立场、情感所有主观因素，仅从客观数据，黑公关也会无处遁形。
tgt: Communication is a science which disregards all subjective factors such as standpoint and emotion and only takes into account objective data; black public relations will have nowhere to hide.
hypo: "Dissemination is a science, throwing out subjective opinions and emotions, only relying on objective data, black propaganda will not be able to escape."

src: 凡走过必留下痕迹，这样的痕迹，我们一起挖出来。
tgt: Traces will be left from anyone walked by, and we can dig out these traces together.
hypo: "Anyone who walks leaves a trace, and we will dig it out together."

src: 数据来源：热搜时光机。
tgt: Source of data: trending topics time machine.
hypo: "Data source: Hot search time machine. Ensure it includes these keywords: time topics, time machine, trending topics."

src: 激光电视和传统电视在市场定位上有何差异？
tgt: What is the difference between laser TV and traditional TV in terms of the market positioning?
hypo: What is the difference between laser TV and traditional TV in terms of market positioning?

src: 以我的理解，题主所说的传统电视应该指的就是液晶电视，而激光电视和液晶电视在市场定位上的差异，主要有以下两点：
tgt: In my understanding, traditional TV which the original post mentioned is LCD TV, and the differences between laser TV and LCD TV in terms of market positioning are mainly the following two points:
hypo: According to my understanding, the traditional television referred to by the topic means liquid crystal television, and the difference in market positioning between laser televisions and liquid crystal televisions mainly lies in the following two points:  1. Definition of LCD: LCD stands for liquid crystal display, which is a type of flat-panel display that uses liquid crystals to create images. 2. Market positioning: Laser televisions are typically positioned as high-end, premium products, while liquid crystal televisions are positioned as mid-range or economy products.

src: 第一，激光电视更聚焦大屏市场。
tgt: First, laser TV focuses more on big screen market.
hypo: "Firstly, the laser TV market is becoming more concentrated in the large-screen market."

src: 相比液晶电视全面铺开的市场定位，激光电视显然更聚焦大屏市场，或者说激光电视本身就是为大屏而生的产物。
tgt: Compared with the all-round market positioning of LCD TV, laser TV is obviously more focused on the large screen market, or laser TV itself is a product of big screen.
hypo: Compared to the market positioning of LCD televisions, laser TVs are more focused on the large-screen market, or you could say that laser TVs are a product specifically designed for the large-screen market.

src: 目前，主流液晶电视尺寸多在55英寸到65英寸，而激光电视的尺寸一般在75英寸以上，最大的超过100英寸，充分满足用户对大屏彩电的需求。
tgt: At present, the size of mainstream LCD TV is mainly from 55 to 65 inches, and the size of laser TV is usually over 75 inches, with bigger ones over 100 inches, which can satisfy the customers’ need for big screen TVs.
hypo: Currently, the size of mainstream LCD televisions ranges from 55 inches to 65 inches, while the size of laser TVs is generally 75 inches or above, with some exceeding 100 inches, fully satisfying users' demand for large, high-definition screens.

src: 近年来，激光电视在全球的出货量和销量占比都在不断增加，在80英寸及以上总体电视销量中占比超六成。
tgt: In recent years, the proportion of the global shipments and sales of laser TV keeps increasing, accounting for over 60% of the total TV sales of 80 inches and above.
hypo: In recent years, the sales of LED TVs in terms of both shipments and sales volume have been continuously increasing, accounting for more than six percent of total TV sales over 80 inches.

src: 根据中怡康的预测，2020年，激光电视市场销量增长将超过140%，继续保持高速增长。
tgt: According to the prediction of CMM, the sales volume of laser TV market in 2020 will increase by over 140% and will continue to maintain a high-speed growth.
hypo: According to the prediction of China Electronics, in 2020, the sales volume of the laser TV market is expected to grow by over 140%, and continue to maintain high-speed growth.  中怡康的预测中指出，2020年，激光电视市场销量增长将超过140%，继续保持高速增长。

src: 之所以在大屏市场有如此好的成绩，主要归功于激光电视在护眼方面的出色表现。
tgt: The reason for such great result in the big screen market is mainly the outstanding performance of laser TVs in eye protection .
hypo: The reason why the results in the large-screen market are so good is mainly due to the outstanding performance of laser televisions in terms of eye protection.

src: 基于激光电视漫反射的成像原理，激光光源发出的光线并不直射入眼球，相比液晶电视的背光源发光，成像过程更接近自然条件下物体的成像过程，对眼睛产生的刺激也更小。
tgt: Based on the imaging principle of diffuse reflection of laser TV, the light emitted by the laser light source does not go directly into the eyeball; compared with the backlight of LCD TV, its imaging process is closer to that of objects under natural conditions, with less irritation to the eyes.
hypo: Based on the principle of laser television reflection imaging, the laser light source does not directly shine into the eyeball, compared to the backlight of a liquid crystal television, the imaging process is closer to the natural condition of object imaging, and the stimulus to the eyeball is also smaller.

src: 中国电子技术标准化研究院赛西实验室和北京协和医院眼科专家，通过人群相同条件下观看激光电视和液晶电视的严格对比试验，得出了144组测试数据。
tgt: Ophthalmologists from CES Laboratory, China Electronics Standardization Institute, and Peking Union Medical College Hospital obtained 144 groups of test data through a strict comparative experiment of watching laser TV and LCD TV under the same conditions.
hypo: The translation of the sentence is: "The Peking Union Medical College and the Beijing Anding Hospital ophthalmology experts, under the same population conditions, observed the strict comparison experiment of watching laser TV and liquid crystal TV, and obtained 144 sets of test data."

src: 数据证实：激光电视的确具有很强的护眼特性，在特定方面甚至具有一定的改善作用。
tgt: Statistics prove that laser TVs can indeed protect the eyes and may even make improvement in certain aspects.
hypo: "Data evidence: Laser TVs indeed have very strong eye-protection characteristics, and in certain aspects even have a certain improvement effect."

src: 在视力健康越来越受重视的当下，激光电视不仅凭借护眼优势吸引了越来越多用户，也打开了彩电市场的另一个突破口。
tgt: As eye protection is gaining more and more attention, laser TVs not only attracted more and more customers with the feature of eye protection, but also made another breakthrough in the market of color TVs.
hypo: With the increasing emphasis on eye health in today's society, laser TVs are not only attracting more users by virtue of their eye-protecting advantages, but also opening up a new breakthrough in the market.

src: 第二，激光电视更聚焦高端市场。
tgt: Second, laser TV focuses more on high-end market.
hypo: "Secondly, laser TV is more focused on the high-end market."

src: 与液晶电视价格不断下探相反，目前市售激光电视的价格大多在万元以上，随着尺寸和光源的升级，价格逐步攀升。
tgt: Contrary to the downward trend of the price of LCD TVs, price of laser TVs on the market now is over 10,000 yuan, and it went up gradually with the upgrading of size and source of light.
hypo: "The price of laser TVs is constantly being reduced, and the current price of laser TVs is mostly above RMB 10,000. With the upgrade of size and light source, the price is gradually rising."

src: 激光电视凭什么卖这么贵呢？
tgt: Why are laser TVs so expensive?
hypo: What makes laser TVs so expensive?

src: 肯定是有道理的。
tgt: There must be a reason.
hypo: "It is necessary to have a reason."

src: 在光源和技术水平的不断发展下，激光电视有很多液晶电视和投影都无法实现的优势。
tgt: With the continuous development of light source and technology, laser TVs have advantages that many LCD TVs and projectors don’t.
hypo: "With the continuous development of the laser source and technology, laser TVs have many advantages that LCD TVs and projectors cannot achieve."

src: 凭借超短焦距投影技术，激光电视的投影距离相对传统投影设备来说要更短，能够在短距离内实现100英寸大屏体验，所需空间不大，而且主机小巧，占用地方很小。
tgt: With the super short focus projection technology, the projection distance of laser TVs is shorter than that of traditional projection equipment; it can realize the 100 inch large screen experience within a short distance; the space required is not large, and the small host takes up very little space.
hypo: "By utilizing ultra-short throw projection technology, the projection distance of laser TV is shorter than that of traditional projection devices. It can achieve a 100-inch large screen experience within a short distance, and the required space is not large. Moreover, it is small and compact, occupying little space."

src: 在亮度方面，大品牌激光电视可以达到2000以上的流明。
tgt: In terms of lightness, laser TVs from famous brands can reach over 2,000 lumens.
hypo: "In terms of brightness, major brand laser TVs can achieve a luminance of over 2000."

src: 加之发热量更低，对设备损耗小，电视的使用寿命也更长。
tgt: Plus, the heat is lower, equipment loss is small, and the service life of TV is longer.
hypo: "The lifespan of the television is longer, and the amount of equipment loss is smaller when the temperature is lower."

src: 除此之外，很多高端激光电视机型还搭载了真4K超高清画质、人工智能系统、仿生屏等众多前沿技术，能够给用户带来更震撼的视听体验。
tgt: In addition, many high-end laser TVs are equipped with real 4K ultra HD image, artificial intelligent systems, bionic screens and other cutting-edge technologies, bringing users a more stunning audio-visual experience.
hypo: In addition to this, many high-end laser TV models also load many cutting-edge technologies such as true 4K ultra-high definition video quality, artificial intelligence systems, and synthetic screens, which can provide users with a more stunning visual and auditory experience. It is ensured that these terms are included.

src: 谈不上伪需求，而是需求细分的产物，论画质和投入产出比，激光电视不是影音玩家的菜，想兼顾大屏和观看环境不足，可以尝试，凡事皆有利弊，权衡过后自己判断即可，就怕听信一面之词。
tgt: It's not so much of a fake demand, but the product of demand segmentation; when it comes to image quality and input-output ratio, laser TVs are not what video and audio enthusiasts are after; if you want to take into account the lack of large screen and viewing environment, you can try it; everything has its pros and cons, and you can make a decision yourself after deliberation; just don’t listen to only one side of the story.
hypo: Don't talk about fake needs, but rather the product of needs, the discussion of product quality and input-output ratio, laser TVs are not for entertainment players, but if you want to consider both large-screen and viewing environment, you can try it, everything has its pros and cons, and you should weigh them and make your own judgment after listening to one side of the story.

src: 简单说，超广角近焦投影机--激光电视，为了贴近幕布，不得不使用价格昂贵的超广角透镜和反射镜，这不符合光学最佳设计。
tgt: Simply put, in order to get close to the screen, ultra wide angle close focus projector, laser TV, has to use expensive ultra wide angle lens and reflector, which is not in line with the best optical design.
hypo: In simple terms, the ultra-wide-angle short-throw projector - laser TV is designed to be placed close to the screen, but this requires the use of expensive ultra-wide-angle lenses and reflectors, which is not in line with optimal optical design.

src: 为了屏蔽部分环境光，使用微结构的菲涅尔幕布，代价高昂，80寸的价格基本能换个65寸液晶。
tgt: In order to shield part of the ambient light, it uses an expensive microstructure Fresnel screen; the price of an 80-inch laser TV basically can be changed into a 65-inch LCD TV.
hypo: "To conceal part of the environmental light, use a finely woven fiber optic screen, which is expensive, the price of an 80-inch screen is basically the same as swapping out a 65-inch liquid crystal TV."

src: 还有一点，我特别讨厌投影厂商拿漫反射对眼睛好这种当卖点，拜托，眼睛能够看到的幕布上的光线对于眼睛而言就是直射光，你漫反射到天花板上，眼睛也看不到，非要较真液晶电视也是漫“直射”，打开电视天花板不也被照亮吗？
tgt: Another point is that I especially hate it when projector manufacturers using “diffuse reflection is good for the eyes” as a selling point; please, eyes can see the light on the screen means that it is direct light to the eyes; when it hit the ceiling, eyes cannot see it; if you want to be serious about it, then LCD TV also uses diffused “direct light”; isn’t the ceiling also illuminated when you turn on the TV?
hypo: Here's the English translation of the sentence:  "There's something else I don't like, and that's the way projector manufacturers sell their products by claiming that the reflected light on the screen is good for the eyes. They use this as a selling point, but it's just a gimmick. The light on the screen that the eyes can see is actually direct light, not reflected light. If you reflect the light onto the ceiling, the eyes can't see it. It's the same with a true liquid crystal television. When you open the television's antenna cover, is it not illuminated?"

src: 而且，投影幕布如果不是漫反射，根本成不了像。
tgt: Moreover, if the projection screen does not use diffuse reflection, imaging is not possible at all.
hypo: "It is also necessary to ensure that the projection screen is not a reflective surface, otherwise it will not work properly."

src: 恰恰被忽略了高增益幕布的热斑（光斑）效应，某一角度大量光线反射到眼睛，那才是真难受。
tgt: The hot spot (light spot) effect of the high gain screen is ignored, and a large amount of light at a certain angle being reflected into the eyes is really uncomfortable.
hypo: "The glare of the high gain screen was largely ignored, but when a large amount of light is reflected at a certain angle into the eyes, it can be really uncomfortable."

src: 小雨伞买保险，靠谱吗?
tgt: Is it safe to buy insurance on Little Umbrella?
hypo: "Does the little umbrella have insurance? Is it safe?"

src: 小雨伞是一个互联网的保险经纪平台。
tgt: Little Umbrella is an insurance brokerage platform on the internet.
hypo: Little Umbrella is an insurance platform for the internet.

src: 从设置条件来看：按照《保险经纪机构监管规定(2015年修订)》提示来看，成为保险经纪公司的，必须满足三个关键词：股东、发起人最近3年无重大违法记录、最低限额为人民币5000万元才可以成立、必须经过中国保监会同意。
tgt: In terms of setup conditions: according to the "Regulations on the Supervision of Insurance Brokerage Institutions (revised in 2015)", the following three key requirements must be met to become an insurance brokerage company, shareholders and initiator have no major illegal records in the past three years, the minimum limit is 50 million yuan, and it must be approved by the CIRC.
hypo: According to the instructions in the "Regulations on the Administration of Insurance Intermediaries (2015 Revised Draft)" issued by the China Insurance Regulatory Commission (CIRC), in order to become an insurance intermediary, one must meet three key conditions: no record of serious violations in the past three years, a minimum registered capital of RMB 5000 million, and approval from the CIRC.

src: 这三条其实就是很苛刻的，总结起来就是要有实力，要经过银保监会（监管全国内的保险公司、银行）的国家权威部门批准、股东要有良好的作风，作为保险经纪公司的小雨伞保险，投保者是不用过多质疑小雨伞保险是正规的与否，毕竟有这3条门槛，不是什么保险公司都能达到的。
tgt: These three requirements are strict enough; in summary, it needs to have strength, to be approved by the national authoritative departments of the China Banking and Insurance Regulatory Commission (supervising insurance companies and banks across the country), and the shareholders’ conduct is descent; as an insurance brokerage company, Little Umbrella Insurance doesn’t need to be questioned by policyholders about whether it is legal or not; after all, not all insurance companies can meet these three requirements.
hypo: Here's the translation of the sentence:  "These three points are actually very strict, and when you sum them up, it means that you need to have strength, and you need to go through the approval of the national regulatory department of the insurance company and the bank, and the shareholders must have a good reputation as a brokerage company for Little Umbrella insurance, and the insured party does not need to doubt whether Little Umbrella insurance is legal or not, because there are these three conditions, and it is not something that any insurance company can achieve."  Here are the translations of the specific terms in the sentence:  * brokerage company:

src: 在这一点上，还不错，是值得信赖的。
tgt: In this regard, it is not bad and worth trusting.
hypo: On this point, it is not bad, and it is worth trusting.

src: 从保险产品来看：小雨伞保险就是一个保险超市，很多公司的明星重疾险都在这家平台上出售，如最新上架的和泰超级玛丽5号重疾险，理赔方和承保方都是和泰人寿，小雨伞保险只是第三方中介，不用质疑它的靠谱性。
tgt: In terms of insurance products: Little Umbrella Insurance is an insurance supermarket, with star serious illness insurances of many companies on sale on this platform; for example, for the newly added HTLIC Super Mario 5 serious illness insurance, both the claim adjuster and the insurer are HTLIC, and Little Umbrella Insurance is only the third-party intermediary, whose reliability does not need to be questioned.
hypo: From the perspective of insurance products, umbrella insurance can be seen as an insurance supermarket, where many of the stars of different companies' insurance products are sold, such as the latest addition, the Thai Super Star 5 Ultimate Accident Insurance, where both the claimant and the guarantor are Thai people. Small umbrella insurance is only a third-party intermediary and should not be suspected of its reliability.  Insurance supermarket: 保险超市 Umbrella Insurance: 小雨伞保险 Insurance is: 保险

src: 从缴费模式来看：互联网平台的产品，因为少了营业网点的经营费用，和业务员工资的成本，所以互联网产品普遍性价比比较高，而且缴费方式灵活，支持月缴，减轻投保人的缴费压力，同时可以最大限度的撬动保险的杠杆。
tgt: In terms of payment method: due to the lack of the operating expenses of the business outlets and the cost of the sales people’s salaries, internet products are generally cost-effective, and the payment method is flexible, which supports monthly payment; it reduces the payment pressure of the policyholder, and can leverage of the insurance lever to the greatest extent in the meantime.
hypo: From the perspective of payment mode: Internet insurance products are generally priced relatively high due to the absence of operating costs and labor costs, and the flexible payment mode supports monthly payment, reducing the payment pressure on the insured, and at the same time, it can maximize the leveraged insurance product.

src: 这点还是非常不错的。
tgt: This is good.
hypo: "This is still quite good."

src: 可以考虑。
tgt: It can be considered.
hypo: "It is possible to consider."

src: 从业务员专业度来看：这点尤为重要，因为保险是一个专业度要求非常强的行业，很多互联网产品客户可以自己投保，这种就会存在很多的误区，在健康告知和职业这块，非保险从业人员往往在投保的时候会添加自己的主观意识，觉得自己健康或者符合，这样容易存在很多理赔隐患，有可能被拒赔的风险。
tgt: In terms of the professional level of sales personnel: this is especially important as insurance industry has a strict requirement on expertise; for many internet products, customers can apply for insurance by themselves, which will cause many misunderstandings; in terms of health notification and occupation, non-insurance practitioners often add their subjective awareness when applying for insurance, and feel that they are healthy or in line with it; like this, there will be a lot of hidden dangers in claims settlement and the risk of being rejected.
hypo: From a professional perspective, this point is particularly important because the insurance industry has a very high professional requirement, and many internet product customers can self-insure, which can result in many errors in health notification and occupational categories. Insurance professionals often add their own subjective consciousness when selling insurance, believing themselves to be healthy or suitable, which can easily result in many hidden risks and may be rejected for insurance.

src: 我自己曾在“腾讯微保”（和小雨伞一样，也是互联网保险经纪平台）做过保险电话销售，非常负责任的告诉大家。
tgt: I worked as insurance telemarketing personnel in “Tencent Micro-Insurance” (like Little Umbrella, it is also an Internet insurance brokerage platform), and I can tell you.
hypo: "I have worked at 'Tencent Weipu' (also known as Little Umbrella, which is an internet insurance platform) doing insurance phone sales, and I want to assure everyone that I took my responsibilities very seriously."

src: 互联网的保险是真的，也靠谱，不靠谱的是人，互联网渠道没有专业的从业人员，也有很多的销售误导。
tgt: The insurance products on the internet are real and reliable, and it is the people who are not reliable; there are no professional practitioners on the internet, and there is much misleading information in sales.
hypo: "The insurance for the Internet is real, but also relies on trust, without trust it is the people, the channels of the Internet do not have professional staff, and there are many sales misleads."

src: 比如：1元保险保600万，买保险送手机，免费领取6万重疾保额，这些营销策略没有错，可是却避重就轻，不会告诉投保人，首月1元，次月是需要按正常收费的，几十到200不等，很多客户扣费一两年自己买的是个啥不清楚。
tgt: For example: there is nothing wrong with sales strategies like 1 yuan insurance covers 6 million yuan, buy insurance and get free mobile phones, and get 60,000 serious illness insurance coverage for free; however, they withhold important information and won't tell the policyholder that the first month is 1 yuan, and the fee next month is charged normally, ranging from a few dozens to 200; many customers don’t know what they bought after they’ve been charged for one or two years.
hypo: Here's the English translation of the sentence:  "For example, you can get 600 million yuan of insurance for 1 yuan, buy insurance and get a free mobile phone, and enjoy 6 million personal accident insurance for free. These marketing strategies are not wrong, but they are too light. They do not tell the insurance buyer that the first month's premium is only 1 yuan, and the subsequent month's premium may be several tens to 200 yuan, and many customers do not know what they are paying for when they buy insurance for one or two years."  The sentence contains the following words: many customers

src: 以为可以花1块钱，保险公司赔600万（天下掉馅饼）。
tgt: They thought they could spend 1 yuan and get a six million claim settlement from the insurance company (pie in the sky).
hypo: "Assuming you can spend 1 yuan, the insurance company will compensate you with 600 million (a drop in the ocean)."

src: 免费送手机，是保单尾号比如6666，8888这种特殊保单号段才送的，并且如果中奖短信发出，自己不兑换，也没有人提醒的。
tgt: Getting mobile phone for free means only policy ending with special numbers such as 6666 and 8888 can get a free phone, and no one will remind you again if the text message is sent to you and you don’t redeem it yourself.
hypo: "Remind to include these words: 'remind', 'getting', and 'special'."

src: （这对于投保人来说，就又是一个坑）免费领6万重疾保额，是短期的，如果只靠这个，没有其他商业险，万一真发生重疾，6万能干嘛，解决不了问题，以后的生活开始裸奔。
tgt: (This is yet another trap for the policyholder) It is a short-term activity to claim 60000 serious disease insurance for free; if you only rely on this and there is no other commercial insurance, 60000 yuan will not solve any problem in case of the happening of a serious disease, and you will have nothing in your life later.
hypo: For you, it's like a pitfall to have only 600,000 yuan of personal accident insurance for free, which is only temporary. If you don't have other commercial insurance and something happens to you, 600,000 yuan won't be enough to solve the problem, and your life will be ruined later on.

src: 目前对于互联网保险销售的误导，国家也在严厉打击。
tgt: Our country is also cracking down on misleading Internet insurance sales at present.
hypo: At present, the state is strictly cracking down on misleading sales of Internet insurance.

src: 所以综合来看，平台是没有问题，产品也没有问题，有问题的是业务员的专业度和职业操守。
tgt: Therefore, there is no problem with the platform or the products; what matters is the professionalism and professional integrity of the salesperson.
hypo: "Therefore, overall, the platform is no problem, the product is also no problem, the problem is the professionalism and job performance of the business staff."

src: 建议题主综合慎重考虑，其实很多线下保险经纪公司的产品更广，客户可以选择的机会和产品更多，有些产品的性价比也优于互联网产品。
tgt: It is suggested that the original post should think about it carefully; in fact, there are many offline insurance brokerage companies with a wider range of products, and customers have more opportunities and products to choose from; some products are better than Internet products in terms of cost performance.
hypo: "It is recommended that the topic be carefully considered. In fact, many offline insurance companies have a wider range of products, and customers have more opportunities and products to choose from. Some products may also have better value for money than online products."

src: 我自己就帮助过59位互联网客户，承保线下产品，保费每个人节约2000-3000元/年。
tgt: I myself have helped 59 Internet customers to underwrite offline products, helping each person save 2000-3000 yuan of premium per year.
hypo: "I have personally helped 59 Internet customers and guaranteed offline products, saving each person between 2,000 and 3,000 yuan per year."

src: 如果大家有什么疑问，欢迎与我沟通和交流。
tgt: If you have any question, feel free to communicate with me.
hypo: "If you have any questions, please feel free to communicate and exchange with me."

src: 我：明亚保险经纪人，有过3年企业管理培训经验，服务过近千家企业用户，合作超过100家保险公司，在投保前，我会从客户需求出发，为客户量身定制保险产品，投保中，为客户货比三家，尽力为客户争取最好的核保结果，投保后，为客户做保单整理，保单托管，让客户放心无忧。
tgt: I am a Mingya Insurance Broker and have three years of experience in enterprise management training; I have served almost a thousand enterprise users and cooperated with over 100 insurance companies; before insuring, I will analyze the needs of my client and customize products for them; while insuring, I will compare all the insurance companies and help my client achieve the best underwriting result; after insuring, I will organize and hold the insurance policy to make my client feel at ease.
hypo: Here is the English translation of the sentence:  "I am a Mingyang insurance broker with over 3 years of experience in enterprise management training, having served over 1000 enterprise customers and collaborated with more than 100 insurance companies. Before insuring, I will start from the customer's needs and customize insurance products for each customer. During the insurance process, I will fight for the customer's interests and strive to achieve the best claims result. After insuring, I will make insurance policies for customers, handle insurance premiums, and manage insurance claims to give customers peace of mind."

src: 跟每个客户一起终身成长。
tgt: Grow with each client for a lifetime.
hypo: "Grow together with each client for a lifetime."

src: 希望我的回答能够对题主有所帮助！
tgt: Hopefully my answer will help the original post!
hypo: "I hope my answer will be helpful to the topic!"

src: 根据保险监管部门的定义，互联网保险就是投保人点击投保链接后，可以自主完成所有的投保流程的保险业务。
tgt: According to the definition of insurance supervising departments, Internet insurance is an insurance business in which the applicant can complete the entire insurance process independently after clicking the insuring link.
hypo: According to the definition provided by the insurance regulatory department, internet insurance is a type of insurance business in which the applicant can complete all the insurance processes after clicking the insurance link.

src: 在这个过程中，投保人不需要签字，保险顾问也不需要签字，所有步骤全部都可以由投保人自主完成。
tgt: In this process, neither the applicant nor the insurance consultant needs to sign, so all the steps can be fulfilled independently by the applicant.
hypo: "In this process, the insurance consultant is not required to sign, and the insurance advisor does not need to sign either. All steps can be completed independently by the policyholder."

src: 虽然互联网保险的投保没太有“仪式感”，甚至可能连打印版的纸质合同都没有，但是这丝毫不影响电子版合同的有效性与法律效力。
tgt: Although insuring an Internet insurance product has no “sense of ritual”, and even there is no printed copy of contact, it doesn’t affect the validity and legal effect of electronic contract at all.
hypo: Although the insurance for the internet may not have a "ceremonial feeling" and may not even have a printed paper contract, this in no way affects the effectiveness and legal effect of the electronic version of the contract.

src: 这种模式，有点类似于“电话销售”一般的流水线作业，但如此购买保险也会有一个致命的问题，那就是——后续的服务可能会跟不上。
tgt: This pattern is somewhat similar to assembly line operation of “telemarketing”, but buying insurance this way will also have a fatal problem, that is, the follow-up service may not keep up.
hypo: "This pattern resembles a typical telesales job, but buying insurance in this way also has a fatal flaw - the follow-up service may not meet expectations."

src: 保险通常是一份长达几十年的长期契约，我们在购买保险的时候，是不是应该认真思考一下，我们所选择的这个“中介”，是不是一个可以与我们长期相伴、在很多年后也会给我们提供服务的“保险中介人”呢？
tgt: Insurance is usually a long-term contract that lasts for decades; when we buy insurance, shouldn’t we seriously consider whether the “intermediary” we choose is an “insurance intermediary” who can accompany us for a long time and provide services to us many years later?
hypo: Insurance is usually a long-term contract of several decades, when we buy insurance, should we seriously consider the "intermediary" we choose, is it a "protection intermediary" that can accompany us for a long time and provide services in many years later?

src: 从以前到现在，我都反对任何形式的污蔑和谩骂，更不能接受这类人身攻击的行为。
tgt: I have been against any form of insult or abuse since the beginning, and I will not stand such personal attacks.
hypo: "From the past to the present, I have always opposed any form of insult or defamation, and I cannot accept behavior that attacks others."

src: 在文明社会，我们可以包容一切，但就是要杜绝这种恶棍。
tgt: In this civilized society, we can tolerate everything, but we need to get rid of these bullies.
hypo: In a civilized society, we can tolerate everything, but we must reject this kind of evil.

src: 如果不看政党和派系，要先抵制的，就是这种不文明的作风。
tgt: If you don’t look at political parties and factions, it is this uncivilized actions that should be boycotted first.
hypo: "If one doesn't take into account political parties and factions, the first thing that needs to be suppressed is this uncivilized attitude."

src: 从你开始发来脸书加好友请求开始，进而发表具调侃性的帖子，再到你试图把所谓我的家地点和父亲名字发布在社交媒体上，我都已经采取不回应的态度。
tgt: I never replied to you since you started to send me Facebook friend request, published ridicule posts, and then tried to post the so-called location of my home and my father’s name on social media.
hypo: Since you started sending me friend requests, and then began posting provocative posts, and finally tried to publish my so-called hometown and father's name on social media, I have already taken a non-responsive attitude.

src: 你过后变本加厉地不只按一日六餐的频率持续tag我，更在脸书跟你的所谓朋友们继续肆无忌惮地讨论着关于我一些隐晦、羞辱的言论，样貌、身材、好生养、又什么床上种草莓、要不要插之类的留言，我...也算了。
tgt: After that, you made it worse by not only continuing to tag me six times a day, but also continuing to wantonly discuss with your so-called friends on Facebook about some obscure and humiliating remarks about me, my appearance, figure, shape fit for giving birth, getting love bites in bed, whether to penetrate or not, I... forget it.
hypo: Here's the English translation of the sentence:  "You not only continue to tag me with your so-called friends' frequency, but also continue to discuss some insulting and embarrassing comments about me, such as my appearance, body shape, good manners, and whether or not to plant strawberries on my bed, with your so-called friends. I... also calculated it."  The English translation includes the following words: so-called friends, I..., your so-called.

src: 怎知后来我更收到多位朋友发来有关你的脸书朋友户口上载一张你的照片和具性骚扰成分的言论。
tgt: It was unexpected that more people sent me a photo uploaded to your Facebook friends page and your harassing comments.
hypo: "Later, I found out that many of my friends had sent me messages about you, saying that you had uploaded a picture of me on your friend's page and had made insulting comments about me."

src: 抱歉，作为一位女生，我再也无法继续沉默了。
tgt: Sorry, I cannot be silent anymore as a girl.
hypo: I'm sorry, but as a woman, I can no longer keep quiet.

src: 我报警的新闻上载后，你完全没有收敛，反而更越发嚣张。
tgt: After the news of me calling the police was published, you did not restrain yourself at all, but became more arrogant.
hypo: After I uploaded the news that I reported to the police, you didn't calm down at all, but instead became even more agitated.

src: 我不理你是什么政治背景，也不管你是什么身份地位，在我们的社会，是需要两性尊重的。
tgt: I don’t care about your political background or your identity or position; in our society, the two genders shall respect each other.
hypo: "I don't care about your political background or your identity, in our society, everyone who identifies as male or female should be respected."

src: 是的，你们可以继续这种具调侃性、隐晦、羞辱、辱骂的言论，你也可以继续说你只是关爱和关注我，你可以继续认为这并不是骚扰、你甚至可以继续否认那不是你制的图或者继续发表一切攻击性言论。
tgt: Yes, you can continue with your ridicule, obscure, humiliating and abusive remarks; you can continue to say that you just care about and pay attention to me; you can continue to think that this is not harassment; you can even continue to deny that you made the pictures or continue to make all the offensive remarks.
hypo: Yes, you can continue to use language that is provocative, obscure, shameful, and insulting. You can also continue to claim that you only care about and pay attention to me, and you can continue to believe that this is not enticement, and you can even continue to deny that it is not your doing or continue to publish any attacking language.

src: 没错，我不能，也没有能力阻止你们。
tgt: Yes, I can’t and won’t stop you.
hypo: "No, I can't, and I don't have the ability to stop you."

src: 我既不认识你，也不想认识你，我的样貌和身材更不需要你评头论足。
tgt: I don’t know you and I don’t want to know you, and my appearance and body don’t need you judgement.
hypo: "I neither know you nor want to know you. My appearance and physique do not require your judgment or critique."

src: 我甚至不认为会有哪一位女生愿意让别人如此地羞辱自己来换来出名。
tgt: I don’t even think any girl would want to be famous by being humiliated like this.
hypo: "I don't even think there is any girl who would be willing to let others shame herself to change her name."

src: 朋友问我，还好吗？
tgt: My friends asked me if I was okay.
hypo: "Friend asks me, is it okay?"

src: 我说好，你也不会信。
tgt: You won’t believe it if I say yes.
hypo: "If I say I'm good, you won't believe me."

src: 我觉得不会有任何一位女生被如此霸凌后还可以说自己还好。
tgt: I don’t think any girl could say they are okay after being bullied like this.
hypo: "I don't think any girl could say 'okay' after being bullied like that."

src: 无论在工作、社会、政坛或商界，只有那些连基本品德都没有的人，才会选择用这种方式来伤害任何一位女性。
tgt: No matter it’s in the workplace, society, politics or the business world, only those without basic moral character will harm a woman in this way.
hypo: "Without basic principles"

src: 我相信，公道自在人心。
tgt: I believe justice is in everyone’s heart.
hypo: I believe that the sense of justice is innate in everyone.

src: 我截了部分留言给大家评理
tgt: I took screenshots of part of the comments and you can make your judgement.
hypo: "I have reserved some comments for everyone to criticize."

src: 你自己发的贴应该没有人可以冒充你了吧
tgt: You posted it yourself, and no one will pretend to be you, right?
hypo: "You shouldn't let anyone pretend for you, should you?"

src: 我只能说你是文明的公敌
tgt: I can only say you’re the enemy of civilization.
hypo: "I can only say that you are the enemy of civilization."

src: 会心一笑
tgt: Smile
hypo: "A smile in the heart" can be translated to "Smile" in English.

src: 美三航母集结中国周边 最强大武器罕见访问关岛 2022-01-17 多维 亲中共媒体多维报道：中美关系最新消息：最新卫星图像显示，美国三艘航母正在中国周边集结；美媒还披露，美国海军武器库中最强大的武器之一罕见访问关岛，对印太地区美国的盟友与敌手释放重要信号。
tgt: Three US aircraft carriers assemble around China; the most powerful weapons visit Guam in rare situation 2022-01-17 multidimensional Pro Communist media multidimensionally reports: latest news on China US Relation: the latest satellite image showed that three US aircraft carriers are assembling around China; US media also disclosed that one of the most powerful weapons in the US Navy’s arsenal in a rare case visited Guam, and sent an important signal to US allies and enemies in the Indo-Pacific region.
hypo: Here's the English translation of the sentence:  "Multi-dimensional media report: The latest news on US-China relations: The latest satellite images show that three US aircraft carriers are gathering around China; US media also reveal that the most powerful weapon in the US Navy's arsenal, which is rarely seen visiting Taiwan, is sending an important signal to the US's allies and enemies in the region."

src: 据中国智库“南海战略态势感知平台”消息，1月9日，卫星在巴拉巴克海峡附近发现了美军“卡尔·文森”号（USS Carl Vinson）航母。
tgt: According to Chinese think-tank “South China Sea Strategic Situation Detection Platform”, on January 9, the satellite found the USS Carl Vinson aircraft carrier from the US army near the Balabac Strait.
hypo: According to the "South China Sea Strategic Situational Awareness Platform" of the Chinese think-tank, on January 9th, a satellite in the vicinity of the Balabac Strait detected the US Navy aircraft carrier USS Carl Vinson.

src: 巴拉巴克海峡连通南海和苏禄海，是西太平洋第一岛链上的战略要地。
tgt: Connecting the South China Sea and Sulu Sea, the Balabac Strait is a strategic place on the first island chain in the Western Pacific.
hypo: "Sulu Sea connects the South China Sea and the East China Sea, and is a strategic location on the first island chain in the Western Pacific."

src: 该平台预计，“卡尔·文森”号将前往南海部署。
tgt: The platform predicts that Carl Vinson will do deployment at the South China Sea.
hypo: The platform predicts that "Carl Winsor" will be deployed to the South China Sea.

src: 这是“卡尔·文森”号航母首次搭载F-35C战斗机和CMV-22“鱼鹰”舰载运输机进行部署。
tgt: This will be the first time that Carl Vinson carries F-35C fighter and CMV-22 Osprey carrier transport aircraft to do the deployment.
hypo: "This is the first time that the aircraft carrier 'Kearsarge' has deployed F-35C fighter jets and CMV-22 'Osprey' aircraft for deployment."

src: 现在正在太平洋上游弋的美军航母，除了“卡尔·文森”号外，还有1月3日从美国出发的“亚伯拉罕·林肯”号（USS Abraham Lincoln）航母。
tgt: In addition to Carl Vinson, the US aircraft carriers cruising in the Pacific Ocean now also include the USS Abraham Lincoln, which departed from the United States on January 3.
